1.title: Let's Begin

11.content:
A Mermaid's Vengeance - In this story, Antala makes the mistake of trespassing in a mermaid's lake. Angered, the mermaid curses Antala with an unquenchable thirst for water. Now Antala must find a way to break the curse before her belly gets too big for her to move.

The Challenge - Antala is challenged by a fellow succubus to drink as much water as she can from an enchanted fountain. Although wary, she accepts the challenge and manages to drink an enormous amount, leaving her with a huge belly. She wins, but learns that the fountain cursed her: she can't get the water out of her belly.

Ultimatum - Antala becomes enraged that humanity is mistreated water, so she comes up with a ultimatum. Using her magic, she begins to consume all the water on Earth and tells humanity that, unless it changes it ways, all of the water will remain in Antala's belly.

Fire vs Water - Antala learns that another succubus has gone mad and is threatening existence with her fire magic. To stop her, Antala must learn how to properly use water magic. But she learns that it comes at a cost: in order for her to use water magic, she must have an enormous quantity of water in her belly
11.title: Water-logged

111.content:
Antala was a lot of things. She was beautiful. She was powerful. She was intelligent. And she was one of the most well know succubi in the underworld.

She was also, at the moment, completely lost.

Antala had been asked by a friend to pick up a rare plant from some old forest on Earth. The place was enormous, but she managed to find the plant. But when she did, she realized that she had no idea which way she came from or how to get back to her portal. Annoyed, she just picked a path and started walking. Three hours later, she had gotten nowhere.

"Alright, now I'm pissed off. Where the hell is the entrance to this place?" She yelled to no one. Blowing a lock of silver hair out of her face, she looked around. All she could see were trees. But then, to her right, she saw a lake. "How did I miss that?" She asked herself. "Doesn't matter. At least I can get a drink."

She walked over to the lake. It was crystal clear. She bent down at the edge of the water and scooped up an handful of water. Slurping the water down, she was amazed at how cool and clean it was. She continued to scoop up and drink until a voice stopped her.

"HEY, what the hell are you doing?!" The voice yelled angrily. Surprised Antala looked up. In front of her was a mermaid. The mermaid was pretty, with green scales for skin and orange eyes. Antala noticed that the mermaid was bald, which didn't surprise her since some mermaids shaved their heads to make swimming easier. Her cloth bra was strained against her breasts, which were slightly bigger than Antala's. Instead of legs, she had a long, green tail.

"Well, are you going to answer me?" The mermaid demanded.

"Uh, sorry to intrude, but I seem to be lost. Do you happen to know where the entrance to the forest is?" Antala asked.

"Why should I tell you? You're a trespasser, and you're drinking my water. Give me one reason why I don't drown you now." The mermaid said.

"Because I am a succubus, and if you don't tell me how to get out of this forest and back to my portal, I will boil your lake until there's nothing left." Antala threatened.

Still fuming, but not willing to lose her lake, the mermaid pointed to the opposite end. "Go that way and keep walking for about 2 hours. You should see a road."

"Thanks." Antala replied. She got up and walked away from the lake. As she walked, she thought she heard the mermaid speak some old language. Too tired to care, she just kept walking.

When she was out of sight, the mermaid chuckled. "So she thinks she can just waltz in here and drink my water? Well, I hope she's happy for now, because she's about to get REAL thirsty. Then she'll learn not to mess with Marissa the Mermaid Witch. I can't wait to see how this goes." Marissa said before laughing. Then she realized something. "Wait, how can I see how this turns out if I can't leave my lake?" She sighed in annoyance. "I really need to think my revenge's through."

2 hours later, Antala finally found the exit and her portal home. Before she entered it, however, she got an odd feeling. It almost felt like she...
111.title: A Mermaid's Vengeance

1112.content:
For some reason, Antala felt like she was heavier then usual. Almost like something was weighing her down. Confused, she looked down and was surprised by what she saw. Her belly had grown. It looked like she was 9 months pregnant. A bit confused, she poked her belly to see if it was real. Sure enough, her finger was pressing against a real belly. It felt like it was full of water. Surprisingly, it felt kinda good. Smiling, she gave her belly a light slap and watched it jiggle. She giggled at this.

'I guess I drank more of that water then I thought.' Antala thought to herself. She then grabbed her belly and jiggled it again. 'Heh. This is actually kinda fun. Maybe I'll enjoy this for as long as I have it.' Smiling, Antala walked back through the portal to the underworld.
----------------------------------------------
A few hours later, Antala was back in her home. She dropped the plant off at her friend (who was a bit surprised by Antala's belly) and returned home straight away. Along the way, she got some weird stares from other succubi.

Now sitting on her couch, Antala looked down at her belly again. It hadn't gotten any smaller since she got home.

"Hm. I should have worked you off with all the walking I did." Antala said, holding her water-filled belly. She smiled. "But you know what, I think I've gotten to like you. There's so much potential fun for you. So I think I'm going to keep you."

Antala yawned after saying that. "Geez. Late already? Guess we'll see more of what you're capable of tomorrow." She said, before giving her belly one last playful slap. Lying down on the couch, she dozed off.
---------------------------------------------
Back in the pond, the mermaid had solved her little problem of not seeing Antala by making a small magic screen in the water. And she was annoyed with what she saw.

"Are you kidding me?! She's supposed to be freaked out by that belly, not happy with it! Why do all my revenges backfire?!" She yelled. "Well, let's just see how much she loves it in the following days." She then let out an evil laugh, hoping for the following days to be torment for Antala. Then she let out a sigh when she was done. "I'm bored now. Might as well go mess with some elves."
---------------------------------------------
The next morning, Antala woke up with a smile. She then looked down the see that her belly...
1112.title: New Potential for Fun

11122.content:
Antala's eyes went wide as she looked at her belly. Overnight, it had manage to double in size. And yet somehow, it managed to remain perfectly spherical. Surprised, Antala put her hands on her belly to confirm that this was real.

"Wow." She said after realizing it was real. "How did you get bigger overnight? I didn't drink any water." She smiled. "Ah, who cares? Twice the belly size means twice the fun."

She then turned her body and started to get off the couch, but struggled with it due to the added weight of her belly. Eventually, she managed to get up. The constant movement made her belly jiggle. She could feel the water sloshing inside.

"Geez." Antala said after finally getting up. "This weight is gonna take some geting used to. I should go do something to help with that. But what?" Before she could think on it, her phone rang. She walked (well, waddled) over to it and picked it up.

"Hello? Oh, hey Kaza. What's up? The beach? Why would you want to go to the beach all of a sudden? Volleyball game? I though you hated sports. Why in the underworld would you want to do that? Oh, you want to try and get a workout? You hate exercise. Admit it, you just want to see me in a bikini, don't you? Just as I thought. Fine, I'll indulge your fantasies. Meet me down there. Alright, bye."

Antala hung up the phone and looked down at her belly, grabbing it. "Well, looks like fate is smiling down on us. We have a chance. Just gotta pick the right thing to wear?"

Antala then went over to her closet and opened it, looking over her options. Eventually, she settled on...
11122.title: What a Coincidence

111222.content:
Antala decided that if she was going down to the beach, she would want to show off her new belly. So she picked up her favorite bikini. The top just barely covered her breasts, and the bottom was basically a thong. Antala grinned as she began to change.

A few minutes later, she was out the door, dressed only in her bikini, her now huge belly bare for the world to see. She smiled. This was going to be fun.
-----------------
About an hour later, Antala arrived at the beach. There were quite a few succubi there already. She then heard a voice and recognized it as her friend Kaza. She turned to look at her.

Kaza was only 2 inches shorter then Antala. She had orange skin, green hair, and purple eyes. She lacked horns and wings, but had the spade tail and hooved feet. But what most people knew about Kaza was her weight. She was quite obese. Her breasts were like beach balls, her butt could fill an entire couch, and her belly reminded Antala of a spare tire. Kaza was one of the heaviest succubi Antala knew.

"Hey Anta!" Kaza said, using Antala's nickname. Before she could continue, she finally saw Antala's belly. "Woah! What happened?"

"Don't know." Antala said. "It just started growing yesterday. But I think it's cool. Watch." On that, she jumped, making her belly jiggle. Kaza could hear the water inside slosh.

"Interesting." Kaza said. "You're sure to draw attention."

"And even if I don't," Antala said. "I'll still love it."

It was well known throughout the succubus world that Antala had a fetish for big, perfectly spherical bellies. If she saw a succubus with one, she instantly fell in love with them.

"Right." Kaza said. "So what do you want to do?"

Antala thought for a moment. "How about I..."
111222.title: To the Beach!

112.content:
"You're serious? You really want me to do this?"

"Yep. Pretty interesting huh?"

"I wouldn't say so much interesting as bizarre."

The two women talking were Antala and Haka, a pair of succubi. Antala was 5'10'' with silver hair, gold cat-like eyes, red skin, an hourglass figure, huge bat wings, a spade tail, and horns. Haka was 5'9'' with blue hair, orange cat-like eyes, silver skin, a pear shaped figure, and only a spade tail. Both were wearing a one-piece bikini, Antala's being purple and Haka's being red. The two of them were standing in front of an old fountain in the human world. It was said to be enchanted. And Haka had just bet that Antala couldn't drink from it and get a huge belly.

"There is no way I'm doing this." Antala said.

"But it's a bet. That means you need to do it." Haka retorted.

"It's enchanted. And you know succubi are supposed to stay away from enchanted things in the human world. Besides, you didn't say what you would do if I did drink from it." Antala replied.

"Because if you do, I'll find a way to hook you up with Uda. And you know how much Uda loves big bellies."

That got Antala's attention. Uda was another succubus, and one of the most well known. She was Antala's height, had short pink hair, green eyes, and blue skin, but the things she was most known for were her breasts. They was gargantuan, easily the size of yoga balls. Another thing she was known for was her love of big bellies. She would only go out with succubi with big bellies. Antala had a massive crush on her. If this would get Uda to see her, she was willing to take it.

"You would really do that?" Antala asked, surprised.

"Of course I would. But only if you drink." Haka replied.

That was all the convincing Antala needed. She jumped into the fountain and immediatly began drinking. As she did, her belly grew. About two hours passed before Antala finished. When she did, her belly was the size of a...
112.title: The Challenge

choices: As Antala sleeps at home, she wakes up the same belly.
Right on cue, her belly bumps into Uda herself.
Antala takes a break at the park.
1123.content:
“Woah,” Antala marveled. Two hours of drinking in the enchanted fountain expanded her belly to the size of a yoga ball. Curious, she gave a pat to the globular gut and caused it to jiggle for several seconds before coming to rest. “Wow, this is… just… wow.”

“I’ll say, with a belly that huge, there’s no way Uda will resist you,” Haka stated.

“You really think so?” Antala asked as she struggled to stand up. She constantly adjusted her stance to counteract the sloshing motion inside her belly. Despite it being filled with water, her belly resembles more of a sphere than a teardrop shape.

“Of course, I saw the girls Uda had dated, and their bellies paled in comparison to yours. Once she sees your big, jiggly belly, I guarantee she won’t keep her hands away from you,” Haka assured, giving her friend a slap to the stomach. “We should probably get back home. I’m going to set things up with Uda. You sure you won’t need help lugging around that water balloon of yours?”

“Funny Haka but no, I’ll be fine. This will give me time to acquaint myself with my new belly.”

“If you say so,” Haka commented as she conjured a portal. “I’ll leave the portal open when you’re ready to leave. I’ll call you after I talked to Uda. Later!”

Antala waved goodbye to her friend as Haka walked through the portal. Staring at her massive orb, she placed her hands under her belly and attempted lifting it. She hoisted it upward a few inches before succumbing to its immense weight and dropped it, watching it bob in place. “I can’t believe I did this, but…” Antala’s mind thought about the blue-skinned busty succubus. Her red skin turned brighter as she blushed; daydreams of her and Uda walking hand in hand flutter her head. “if this giant stomach gives me a chance with Uda, then I suppose… no, it has been to be worth the trouble.” Restored with certainty, Antala marched (or waddled in this case) toward the portal and headed home.

---


In the Succubus World, many of the fellow succubi were astonished at the bumbling Antala waddling down the sideway. The big-bellied succubus panted heavily she wiped the sweat from her forehead. Her yoga ball of a belly swung side to side with each laborious step, accompanying by the sound of the sloshing water.

“Is that Antala? Goodness, what happened to her?”

“Look at her belly. How can she move with something so massive attached to her?”

“Does anyone else hear sloshing? That’s not coming from Antala, is it?”

Antala overheard some the chatter while trudging along. Disregarding the gossip, she continued waddling her way home.

“This belly is a bigger problem than I thought,” she noted. “I really need to get home; maybe some rest and sleep will help take off the weight. Though I must admit, hearing the water splashing inside is kind of alluring. But I’ll listen more to my belly once I’m home, preferably before this water gut causes any incident.”
1123.title: Gaining a Belly to Score a Date

115.content:
Here are some more water options that I hope are okay with Doc.

Ice Cold Getaway - Antala is a cruise director on a cruise ship that is spending the entire summer traveling the ocean. Along the way, they run into a mysterious rainbow-colored iceberg. The iceberg cannot be destroyed by bombs or fire, so Antala is forced to get rid of the iceberg in a rather unorthodox way; by eating it. Revenge of the Elephant - In this story, Antala is a succubus working in a medical lab who has accidentally been infused with elephant DNA. With the transformation she obtains a thirst that she cannot control and begins to use her trunk to slurp up as much water as she can. However, the water builds up into her stomach until she is a demonic pachyderm water balloon. Will Antala stay with her job at the hospital or will she be forced to join the circus?
115.title: Reader's Choice

1152.content:
Antala was a succubus. She was 4,835 years old, which was not even the succubus equivalent of 25, stood 5’10” with a weight of 187lbs. She had silver hair with gold cat-like pupils and red skin. Or rather she did until something rather extraordinary happened. Antala had been hired as an intern in a medical lab outside of Collective General hospital. That very night, something terrible was happening under the hospital’s very roof, for the janitor was secretly up to unauthorized medical research. The janitor was a reddish brown haired man. It was impossible to tell because of how gaunt he was, but he looked like an ogre. He required a cane to walk due to a weak leg and his face was disfigured due to a botched plastic surgery (from a completely different hospital mind you).

This man was performing his research in the morgue. He had snuck in after the medical examiner left and was messing around with some strange and unknown formulas. “That bone-headed community,” said the crooked man to himself. “They’ve outlawed my work as crimes against nature and society. But it is I who will laugh last. Once I complete this formula, foreign militaries will pay through the nose for this special steroid that shall create an army of superhuman soldiers. Just as soon as I perfect it. The pachyderm DNA is still highly unstable. Only a few more adjustments to make.”

Of course, when you use science for immoral, selfish or outright evil intentions, you must be expected to pay the consequences sooner or later, because these unlawful experiments always managed to backfire on those foolish enough to undertake them. At that moment in the parking lot, Antala was getting ready to drive the hospital’s medical examiner home while she was busy sipping a large bottle of water. As soon as she finished that bottle, she took out another one and was about to drink it when her boss showed up.

The medical examiner was a very large kappa woman resembling a dark blackish blue-skinned leatherback turtle with white spots all over her body and a thick shell that alone weighed 500lbs. “You keep drinking so much, I sometimes wonder if you’re a water element monster.” Antala blushed in embarrassment. “Sorry about that Nala,” said Antala. “I guess I was working harder than I thought. So, any plans tonight.” “Not really,” said Nala. “It’s going to be quiet next door. Mr. Plunkett got arrested for stealing my cable.” Antala let out a laugh. “Serves that guy right. He was always threatening his oldest son with punishment for helping people with their pets. Not to mention he was the biggest hypocrite I’ve ever seen.” Nala let out a laugh. “I don’t know why he was always on that boy’s case. Somebody who knowingly commits crimes that harm people is in no position to criticize his son for doing something unambiguously good. Maybe after spending a few months in the slammer, he’ll straighten up and fly right.”

Both girls laughed but then Antala gasped. “Darn!” yelled Antala. “What’s wrong?” asked Nala. Antala let out a sigh. “I left my coat in the morgue. I’ll be right back.” What Antala didn’t know was that at that moment in the morgue, the evil janitor was almost completing his concoction and had put it in a syringe. “Now,” he said. “Now. The moment I’ve been waiting...” Before the man could finish his sentence, he heard the door open and panicked, tossing the syringe into the air. “Anton?” asked Antala as she took her coat. “What are... ouch!” Anton looked in shock as his syringe landed on Antala’s shoulder and injected his serum into her. “Oh no.” Thought Anton. Antala grunted and groaned as she walked out and then pulled out the syringe. “What the?” she asked. “Oh.” Antala felt woozy and her mouth felt dry. “I need some water.” Anton watched nervously and tried to escape as Antala walked to a nearby water cooler and then proceeded to empty the contents into her mouth. As she drank the water, her belly started to bulge out.

By the time Antala was done, she looked at her reflection in the bottle of water and gasped because she saw the face of a strange creature that looked like a hybrid of a succubus and a(n)....
1152.title: Revenge of the Elephant

choices: Attacking the Man Who Did This to Her
11521.content:
Antala could not believe it. Standing before her in the mirror was a strange barrel-bellied creature that had the red skin, horns, wings, hooves and tail of a succubus with silver hair and golden eyes, but with the thick skin, large ears, enormous trunk and two long tusks of an African elephant. Antala was speechless at what she had become. She was so scared of her new form that her skin turned a pale platinum shade as she let out a trumpeting scream. "What happened to me!?" shouted Antala. "What happened to my face! I'm an elephant!" Antala trumpeted again and felt her stomach in pain as it continued to swell and the potion that mutated her was still acting up inside of her.

"Water!" shouted Antala. "Water! I need more water!" Antala burst through one of the hospital walls and then found another water cooler and stuck her large trunk right into the nozzle as she begun to drink it. In the confusion, Anton figured the best thing to do would be to run off before Antala realized exactly who it was who created the mutagen that transmogrified her. "Discretion is the better part of valor," said the corrupted janitor turned wicked scientist to himself. "That stupid succubus used up my super steroid and if word gets out on what happened, I'm dead meat."

Anton heard more loud trumpeting and then heard a crashing sound because Antala had tossed the water bottle right through a hospital window before the succubus elephant hybrid let out another scream. Anton was now afraid for his life and then tried to run. He was not going to stay around a hospital with what was essentially a rouge elephant if it could be avoided. However, he bounced off of another large belly, one that felt like it was encased in a shell made of rubber. Anton grumbled and then looked up to see Nala and she didn't look happy.

"Anton," said the medical examiner. "What the devil is going on here? It sounds like a circus." Upon seeing another of the hospital staff, Anton panicked. "Dr. Kato!?" yelled Anton. "What are you doing here?! You should get out of here, right now!" Nala, being a medical examiner, knew a suspicious person when she saw them and none were more suspicious than Anton was acting at this exact moment. "Why?" asked the kappa. Anton stammered and stuttered as he tried to think of an explanation when there was a loud crash.

Anton and Nala walked into the hallway and Nala's jaw dropped as she saw the elephantine Antala with a larger and more liquid-filled belly. Antala in her desperate thirst had broken into a vending machine and was slurping down bottles before tossing them aside and trumpeting. "An-Antala?" asked Nala in dumbfounded horror. Antala then trumpeted and held her ears. She was not in the most stable mood and her next thoughts turned to...
11521.title: Antala the Elephant

11523.content:
Antala saw her face was starting to look like that of a woolly mammoth. She was already growing a trunk and tusks but now long red fur was growing all over her body and her silver hair was growing down her back as her feet turned flat and she felt her mouth growing dry. "Water," groaned the succubus. "Water. What's happened?" Anton bit his fingers. "You fool," said Anton. "My super soldier formula isn't perfect!" "What!?" shouted Antala. Anton grabbed his face as Antala stormed up to a refrigerator and was going through it.

"All that work wasted! It took me weeks to perfect the ultimate infusion of pachyderm and demon genes. I was going to sell that to fund my experiments! And now you've ruined it, you stupid, stupid, stupid, succubus!" Antala overheard what was going on and went through the refrigerator, chugging water from every single bottle that she could find. "What?" asked Antala as she sucked some bottled water. "Those experiments are illegal, Anton! You could go to jail for life for creating those kinds of mutagens." Anton gave a scoff. "Why do you think that I was doing it in secret!? You're a moron, you know that!"

Antala did not like that insult and in rage, she tore the door off of the fridge and then blew her trumpet in Anton's face, causing his toupee to fall off. "Don't you DARE call me a moron! What you're doing is monstrous! I'm the victim here! I'm mutating! Antala trumpet as her belly expanded with more and more water until her belly turned bright blue. "More water!" yells Antala. "More water! More water! I need more water!" Antala's stomach bulged out so much that it caused a table to flip over and she was even spraying excess water from her trunk.

The mutating succubus was now a full mammoth/succubus hybrid and was thirstier than ever. She tore open the fridge but there were no more bottles of water. As she ripped open the fridge, Antala saw that there was nothing left but ice cubes. She was so thirsty that she was desperate and she inhaled the ice cubes off the floor with her trunk and then blew them into her mouth and chewed on them. "Ugh!" yelled Anton. "That is absolutely disgusting." Antala then felt her eyes glowing. She was so stressed out, she was about to become a rouge elephant.

Does she manage to hold herself together or does she go on a rampage through the hospital?
11523.title: Mammoth Meltdown

115231.content:
As upset as Antala was with her transformation, she held onto her head and then breathed in and breathed out and then shook her head as she trumpeted. She was not going to rampage. Not here. This was a hospital and this was the very hospital where she worked. Antala grunted and then snorted, blowing Anton to his feet. Anton saw Antala looming over his smaller body and was terrified. He tried to inch away but Antala held him up and then glared at him. Anton screamed and this alerted Nala to come in.

"What's going on in there?" asked the kappa. "Antala, are you o... oh my goodness!" Nala looked up at Antala whose belly was bouncing up and down as the mammoth trumpeted again. "An-Antala?" asked Nala. "Is that you?" Antala nodded her head. "Cross my heart and hope to die, Nala. This creep has been fooling around with mutagen." "What?!" yelled Nala in a horrified and disgusted tone. Anton gave a gulp. "Looks like the jig is up." "Antala," says Nala sternly. "Drop him." Antala trumpeted loudly and then she dropped Anton to the ground with a thump. Nala then walked up to the phone and then she decided to contact the police. "Hello? Barry? This is Nala. You won't believe it, but some crook at this hospital turned Antala into a succubus mammoth hybrid. No, I'm serious." Nala took a photograph of Antala with her camera phone and sent it to the police on the off chance that the police didn't believe her. Antala then turned to Anton and smirked. "Oh," she said. "I wouldn't want to be you, Anton." Anton then let out a groan.

It wasn't long until the police came to take the villainous scientist away. The lieutenant from the looks of it was a male werewolf with blonde brownish hair and a long nose. "You'll get life for this." He told Anton. Anton let out a sigh as the sirens blared. "So I've heard." Antala and Nala watched as Anton was taken away in the paddy wagon. Nala could only shake her head. "Science can be a very dangerous thing. Especially when it is used irresponsibly." Nala then heard a moaning and a trumpeting and turned around.

As Nala turned around, she stopped Antala trying to drown her sorrows in bottled water, but all this did was give her a more severe case of belly bloat. "Antala?" asked the kappa to her transmogrified friend. "Antala, are you alright?" Antala burst into tears as she moaned. "Look at me. I'm supposed to be learning as an intern to be a doctor but now look at me! I'm a mammoth. I'm too big to even fit in the darn hospital. Antala moaned and shook her head again. "What can I do for the hospital, now." Antala looked down at Nala and Nala gave a smile. "Don't worry, Ant, we're in this together and I have just the idea."

Antala gave a blink and snorted before drying her tears. "Really?" she asked her best friend. Nala nodded her head. "It just so happens that the hospital is due for the annual charity event to benefit the pediatrics wing. I'm in charge of coming up with what to do for charity and you've given me a great idea." Antala blinked. "What is that." Nala gave a laugh. "Well," she said. "Actually, I have two ideas. 1) We could do a charity car wash or 2) We could run a charity circus. Either way, it's perfect for a mammoth. What do you say."

Antala twirls her trunk as she puts a lot of thought into her next decision and she decides to do the charity...
115231.title: In this Together

1153.content:
Snowy Succubus: In this story, Antala is extremely hot-headed, always on the verge of an angry meltdown. One day, she makes the mistake of pissing off a Yuki-Onna, who puts a curse on her. Antala's belly ends up filling with snow that never melts, and when she gets angrier, not only does her belly fill more, but she causes a snowstorm. Antala must now learn to control her vicious temper while finding a way to break the curse. (Before anyone asks about this add, snow is frozen water, same thing with ice, so technically, it counts as a water chapter.)

Goddess of the Storm: In this story, Antala is a Goddess Succubus. Her job is being the Goddess of Storms, responsible for all the weather changes in the Succubus World. She's still rather new to this, so she doesn't have perfect control. She can control all forms of weather, but her favorite is anything related to rain. She even has rainwater filling up her belly, and it grows bigger every day.
1153.title: Next Option

11531.content:
"GET OUT OF MY WAY, BEFORE I BEND YOUR SPINE LIKE A SLINKEY!"

That was something common you'd hear with Antala. She had the worst temper of any succubus. The tiniest things could send her into a blind rage. Like today. She had gone shopping in the monster world, and couldn't go one minute without exploding in rage.

She finally left the store and was walking down the street. Even just walking down the street, she was seething. Anything could cause a total meltdown with her.

And unfortunately, something did.

Suddenly, Antala was knocked to the ground, causing all of her stuff to fall out of the bags. Her eye now twitching in anger, she looked to see who knocked her down.

The culprit was a Yuki-Onna, who was rubbing her head. She had long blue hair, grey eyes, and ice blue skin. She was also incredibly fat, probably about 600 pounds.

"I'm so sorry, miss." The Yuki-Onna said. "I didn't-"

"WATCH WHERE YOU'RE GOING, YOU F**KING WHALE!" Antala yelled. "WHAT?! YOU IN A HURRY TO CRAM MORE FOOD INTO THAT GAPING MAW OF YOURS?!"

The Yuki-Onna frowned. "I- I-" She stammered.

"YOU F**KING PIG! ALL MY STUFF IS BROKEN NOW! THANKS A LOT, FATASS!" Antala continued screaming. She then got up, picked up what she could, and stomped off.

The Yuki-Onna was close to crying. "You mean succubus." She said to herself. "I can't help my weight. I can't lose it. Well, if you're going to be so mean, you might as well be punished for it. Every time you get angry, snow that never melts will fill your belly. And a snowstorm will follow."

Having said her curse, the Yuki-Onna got up and walked off, sniffling.

Now, where is Antala going?
11531.title: Snowy Succubus

12.content:
Now there are many ways we can do this.

Storyline 1- Fire Eater- In this storyline, Antala is one of many monsters that were captured and used as a sideshow. She is the succubus fire eater. However, the fire of Earth is not what Antala is used to from the land of monsters and it has an unusual side effect on her figure.

Storyline 2- Bride of Vesuvius- In this storyline, Antala is on vacation near Pompeii where she hears strange sounds and gets word of volcanic activity coming from Mt. Vesuvius. As she goes to investigate, she gets caught up in an eruption. However, not only does the lava not burn her, she's able to eat it without consequences. Almost. (Hey, lava counts as fire).

Storyline 3- The Undying Dragon- In this storyline, Antala is an evil spirit that devours the souls of humans and other monsters that she seduces. But makes the mistake of eating a dragon's soul and it causes her to change her appetite and lead her to seek out fire to appease the restless dragon soul inside her.

That's all I have for now.
12.title: Fire in Her Belly

121.content:
In another world beyond our own planet Earth, there exists all matters of supernatural creatures from ancient mythology. Lately, portals have been opening up, connecting these worlds and allowing the creatures of mythology to pass into the world of the humans. While a lot of these creatures are feared by human beings, there are times when these creatures are the ones who should fear humans.

Several monsters were captured and put to work in a sideshow as freaks. They hate this position and want to break free, but none of them are strong enough to get past the circus guards. The monsters could only lay in wait for any opportunity to escape. The sideshows consisted of a mermaid girl resembling a tropical koi fish swimming in a large tank, a blindfolded gorgon girl who was wearing chains. A cobra naga girl forced to be an exotic dancer as well as a sphinx girl that was forced to jump through a ring of fire. The sphinx girl even had a scar as she looked at the ring in worry.

"You better do it," whispered a snapping turtle kappa man into the sphinx's ear. "Things will be much worse if you don't jump." Reluctantly the sphinx jumped through the ring. Looking on were a couple more captured monsters, including the newest sideshow. She was named Antala and she was a red skinned and silver haired succubus with gold eyes and an hourglass figure with a huge butt and E-Cup breasts. She was speaking with a red furred minotaur man who was wearing chains around his body.

"Look at them," said the succubus girl. "It makes me sick. This rotten place is taking away our dignity. We're monsters, not objects of amusement to these humans." The minotaur let out a snort. "We have no choice, Antala. These are silver chains they have on us. We couldn't escape if we tried." Antala held up a stick at one of the rings of fire to light it and looked at the flames. They were red-orange, unlike the blue flames that she was used to. She even smelled the fire and gagged.

"Terrific," she said. "They expect me to be a fire eater just because I'm a succubus. That's so racist." "Well," says the minotaur. "You're not the one in control." Antala let out a sigh before she stuck the flames into her mouth. "If only there was a way to break free." She thought to herself. Little did Antala know that there was going to be a way to escape and as she swallowed that fire something was happening inside her stomach...
121.title: Fire Eater

choices: Antala Flies to the Top of Vesuvius
122.content:
A tour bus arrived at a stop in Italy. Several monsters from the darkest corners of the Earth were on vacation in Italy but one in particular was a young (4,835 year old) succubus with pitch red skin, gold cat-like eyes and silver hair stepped onto the bus along with the rest of the tour group. Her name was Antala and she had decided to see the wonders of the human world. As she stepped on the bus, she gives a smile. "Bella," she says. "So this is Italy." One minotaur stepped on the bus and gave a snort. "Personally," he said. "Greece is better." An obese werewolf woman stepped on the bus next and gave a growl. "Watch your mouth." Antala took her seat and all the monsters looked at the tour guide who looked in fear. Obviously she was afraid of being devoured by the tour bus full of monsters. However, she swallowed her fear and prepared to do her job.

"Bonjourno," said the tour guide. "I am Alexandra and I will be your tour guide for today's trip around Italy. Several of the monsters on this bus originated from the Roman empire." The minotaur gave a snort and rolled his eyes but Antala ignored him as the bus took off. "On your right, you will see the famous Baths of Caracalla. These public baths were build between 212 and 217 A.D. during the reign of Septimius Sevarus. Every day for 6 years, 2,000 tons of material were installed to these baths which would become the second largest in Rome." Antala looked at the Roman baths and snapped a photograph. The tour bus then passed one of the aqueducts of Rome. She would've photographed an aqueduct but a large and overweight gargoyle woman got in the way to snap a photograph herself, leading to Antala snapping a photograph of the back of the gargoyle's head, to her dismay.

As the tour continued, they soon reached Naples. In the distance, Antala saw an island with a rather large volcano up ahead. "What is that island in the distance, Alexandra?" Alexandra begun to shake in fear. "Oh," she said. "That. That is the island of Pompeii. In 79 AD, the island was destroyed when Mt. Vesuvius erupted, burying and petrifying the remains of the inhabitants. One cyclops kid in the crowd blinked (or rather winked) before speaking. "Is that where we're heading next? Isn't Vesuvius still active?" Antala gave a look of surprise. "Is it?" Alexandra nervously laughed and waved her hand. "N-Now, don't, don't worry. Vesuvius won't be erupting anytime soon." Alexandra sweated heavily as the minotaur man from the tour gave a smirk. "She's the one who looks ready to erupt." He said with a laugh. "Now," says Alexandra. "We will take the next ship to Pompeii. As they got closer, Antala saw several perfectly preserved ruins and what looked like plaster casts of those who perished in the flames. She then looked up and thought that she saw some smoke coming from the top of the volcano.

The tour group stopped at a cafe at the foot of the mountain but instead of focusing on her gelato, Antala couldn’t help but think about Mt. Vesuvius. “Alexandra said that it wasn’t going to erupt,” said the succubus. “But I’m not so sure. Being a fire-element monster, maybe I should take a closer look at this Vesuvius.” It was at that moment that....
122.title: Off to See the Volcano

choices: Try To Figure Out What Happened
Attempt To Take The Man's Soul Anyway
123.content:
Its a relatively normal day in the mountains. Everything is quiet until the silence is shattered by an explosion. Somewhere on a mountain flames are erupting from a cave. Once they die down a red skinned succubus walks out brushing herself off. She's got an hourglass figure with E cup breasts, as well as a spade tail. "Jeez, he sure seemed angry." Antala says. "Guess he wasn't too fond of me eating his soul." she says. Being a succubus, Antala seduces and feeds on the souls of other creatures. Her latest victim was a dragon man she met the other day. He was pretty aggressive in bed, but she still got him. Unfortunately when she was about to take his soul he fought back. She still managed to get it though, only getting a little singed.

"I gotta say though not many actually fight back like that." she says to herself. "He must have been a nasty piece of work." She spreads her bat like wings and takes off into the sky. Overall she's pretty satisfied. She got out alive and that dragon was a pretty good lay. Little does she know that that dragon's soul is restless and vengeful. As she flies through the sky she begins to feel hungry again. "Whoa, I thought I was full." she says as she scans the area below. She spots a town and figures that would be a good place to grab a human soul or two, so she lands there. After disguising herself as a human with a little magic Antala heads into town looking for some prey.

The first thing she spots is a tavern so she goes in there. This should be a good place to find some men. When she enters she sees a good candidate and sits down at his table. "Hey there handsome." she says. The man smiles and lights up a cigarette. For some reason the sight of the small flame makes her hungrier and before she can think Antala grabs his lighter and licks the flame up. "Whoa! Thats some trick!" the man says impressed. "Uh..yeah." Antala says, not knowing exactly why she did it. The only thing she does know is that the fire tasted pretty good. What does she do now?
123.title: The Undying Dragon

choices: Find Some More Fire In Town
1233.content:
After tasting that little flame Antala wants some more. Using her succubus charms she starts seducing the man in front of her. "So do you come here often?" she asks while twirling her hair. "Yeah, but I haven't seen you around." he answers with a smile. She gives him a flirtatious smile and places her hand on his. "How would like to see a little more?" she asks seductively. The man grins and nods eagerly. "That sounds great, why don't get ourselves a room?" he says. The two of them get up and head for the back. The tavern also functions as an inn so there are various rooms for rent. They enter a vacant one and get right to it.

Antala lays on the bed and begins undressing while the man does as well. He strips rather quickly and is naked before she's even halfway done. He sure is eager. Meanwhile Antala doesn't seem all that excited. She's about to have this guy's soul but the thought doesn't have the same appeal it usually does. With a sigh she stops undressing and waves a hand in front of his face. He falls asleep instantly, she just used a sleep spell on him. Deciding to test something she removes her disguise from her hand. With her claws revealed she reaches into his very soul and pulls it out. Hesitantly she has a taste and finds that it doesn't satisfy her at all. Disappointed she tosses it back into the sleeping man and puts her clothes back on. As she gets up to leave she reaches into his pants pocket and grabs his lighter. Curiously she makes a flame with it and slurps it up, finding it quite tasty. With a shrug she leaves the spellbound human in the bed.

Upon leaving the room Antala calls over to the innkeeper. "The gentleman I went in with will pay for the room." she says as she leaves. When she gets outside she pulls out the lighter again and eats another flame. She's getting used to the taste and wants more. While she wants to find out why she's eating fire all of a sudden she really wants to sate her hunger. What does she do?
1233.title: Attempt To Take The Man's Soul Anyway

choices: She Spots Some Type Of Monster
12332.content:
Antala decides to make her way out of the town. Since she isn't going to be eating any souls she doesn't feel the need to stay. As she leaves she pulls out the lighter and has another fire snack. She eventually reaches a forest outside of town and looks around. She knows the lighter won't last forever so she begins thinking about how to get more fire. With a flick of her finger she produces a small flame on the tip. It barely looks like a snack and producing a bigger one would take more energy. She realizes it would take too much magic to satisfy herself and sighs.

Then it hits her. She doesn't need to make a lot of fire. It practically makes itself! She then begins gathering leaves and plants to make a pile on the forest floor. With another flick of the finger she tosses a flame at it and it catches fire. After waiting a few seconds it begins to grow. Once the whole pile is burning she helps herself. Reaching in she grabs a handful and stuffs it in her mouth. It tastes so good that she begins grabbing more and more, until the fire is gone. With a burp she sets off, unaware that her stomach has gotten slightly bigger.

Antala begins walking on a path that leads to a mountain trail. She climbs the mountain, wondering why exactly she likes to eat fire now. Then she passes a cave and remembers the dragon. Maybe his soul had something to do with it! She'll have to look into that later, but for now...
12332.title: Go Searching Elsewhere

124.content:
The Hybrid - In this story, Antala is actually a hybrid: her mother is a succubus, and her father is a dragon. Because of this, she has traits from both species. She also has an odd quirk: she can produce fire in her belly, but is unable to expel it. As such, she is forced to live with a giant belly. This story simply follows her life.

Flame of Passion: In this story, Antala gains a new power: her belly has suddenly become massive with something called the "Flame of Passion", and when she breaths this flame, anyone hit by it will be filled with love. Overjoyed, she uses this power to play matchmaker, hoping to make people happy.
124.title: More Burning Options

1241.content:
Of all the succubi in the Succubus World, Antala was one of the most interesting. And that is saying a lot, since there are many, many succubi.

But not all of them were hybrids.

You see, Antala's mother was a succubus, but her father was a Chinese Dragon. How they fell in love is unknown, but eventually, Antala came into the world as the first succubus-dragon hybrid. At 24 human years of age, Antala went out on her own.

Antala was considered a knockout beauty. She was 5'11'', had long silver hair, and gold cat eyes. She had the spade tail, demon horns, and hooved feet of a succubus, but was covered head to feet in red dragon scales, had dragon wings, and a dragon snout. She had a great hourglass figure, with E cup breasts, wide hips, and a big ass.

But her most prized feature was her belly. When she was 21 human years, she learned that she could produce fire in her belly, but could not expel it in any way. As such, it continued to build in her belly. Now, she has a beach ball sized belly that was burning hot to touch. And she loved it. She developed a big belly fetish because of it, and was always caressing it.

Now, what kind of adventure will she be going on today?
1241.title: The Hybrid

choices: Believed her and laid down her sword
12411.content:
Antala lived in a well-furnished cave a few miles away from the small village of Terak. The people knew about her and were quite friendly, since they knew she was harmless. Because of this, despite not actually living in the city, Antala was considered a welcome citizen.

Today, Antala was just lazing around, reading a book that was lying on her huge belly (though Antala couldn't expel the fire, she could lower it's temperature to room temperature. She never understood how). Suddenly, she heard metallic footsteps near the entrance. Antala could only think one thing as she got up:

'Not again.'

Being part-dragon, Antala often had to deal with random Knights or other stupidly brave people wanting to "slay" her for various reasons. Most of the time, she just scared them off with a dragon roar.

Walking to the front of the cave she saw the new knight. The knight was a young woman, about mid-twenties. She had no helmet on, revealing a tanned face with green eyes and red hair. She was wearing full body armor. In her hand was a sword.

"Vile dragon beast!" The woman yelled in a accent Antala couldn't place. "I have come from Morveno to end your terrible reign of destruction."

"Morveno?" Antala asked, tapping a finger on her belly. "Sorry, never been there."

"Liar!" The woman yelled. "A dragon had come to our village, burned it, ate our livestock, and stole our gold!"

Antala sighed. "Well, I'm not the one you're looking for. I don't eat live animals, I have a job, and I can't breath fire. Watch." She said. Then she inhaled and breathed out a small cloud of smoke. Doing this, her belly inflated again.

The woman raised an eyebrow. Antala rolled her eyes. Clearly this knight still had doubts.

"Look, go over to Terak. They'll tell you I mean no harm." Antala said.

After a moment, the young woman...
12411.title: Yet Another Misguided Knight

124112.content:
Unfortunately, for Antala, this knight didn't believe her and held her sword dangerously close to the succubus's face. "You must think I'm an idiot!" yelled the lady knight. "You think I don't know how clever and sneaky you dragons can be?! In that ridiculous succubus disguise, I see through it. I heard that dragons could change themselves into other mythical beasts and I can tell that you're a dragon disguised as a succubus just by those scales alone." Antala rolled her eyes and blew smoke out of her nose. "Listen," says Antala. "I'm not a dragon disguised as a succubus, I'm a dragon who's also part succubus. It's a long, long story..."

The knight gave a look of surprise and shook her sword, lowering it to Antala's neck. "You dragons truly are monsters. You're mixing together with other beasts of mythology to create monstrous hybrids. Wait! Wait a minute! If that's true, where is the parent dragon." Antala's eyes bulged out in fear at what the knight most likely had in store. "Do you seriously think that I'd tell you where to find my family?! Besides, I'm not that kind of dragon. My father's not one of those barbaric western dragons. He's a Chinese dragon." The knight looked in confusion.

"In the west," says Antala. "Dragons are usually evil and dangerous but in the East, dragons are for the most part benevolent and wise." "Well I've never seen a Chinese dragon before," says the knight. "How do I know that they're any different from western dragons." Antala bit her jaw and growled as her eyes glowed. "Well," she said. "It looks like I'm going to have to show you the difference." Antala exhaled as if to breathe fire, but she knew she couldn't expel it.

Antala's belly bulged out and pushed the knight to her feet and startled the knight's horse in the process as it neighed loudly. Antala's scales took on a more bronze colorization and her hair grew longer as her horns curved and her hoofed feet turned into reptilian-like talons and her teeth grew sharper as her face begun to elongate into a large snout as smoke came out of her now flat nose. Antala's neck elongated as her tail took on a more serpentine form. Her body became longer as her belly grew bigger and bigger and the knight looked up in surprise. She had never seen a dragon of such an unusual shape before. Chinese dragons were a whole new thing for her. The knight actually trembled as she tried to hold up her sword and shield.

But Antala didn't fear the knight and kept exhaling as her belly filled up with fire until it was the size of a....
124112.title: Doubting Jane

1241121.content:
Antala's belly filled with fire until it looked like she had swallowed an entire cow. Antala let out a roar as the female knight held up her sword and shield. She had never seen a Chinese dragon before and what Antala had turned into boggled her mind. "Wh-What?" asked the knight. "What is that thing?!" Antala gave a snort. "Thing?" she asked. "How very rude. I'm not a thing. I'm a dragon." The knight looked at Antala again and again and couldn't believe it. "This is the hybridized dragon that I've heard so much about. You don't look like any dragon that I know of. Dragons are large-bellied lizards with horns and wings. While you have the belly down, you don't look like any kind of dragon that I've heard of."

Antala let out a sigh. "That's because Chinese dragons look much different that the kinds of dragons that you're used to. We look much different. Antala blew smoke from her nose as her belly filled again with fire. "My father was such a dragon and he's as wise and gentle as most Chinese dragons come. Eastern dragons are the benevolent dragons. But if you don't believe me, come at me. I won't do anything to stop you." Antala, feeling rather confident, held out her large belly that was so very much filled with fire that it was glowing shades of bright orange and yellow.

The knight held out her sword and shook it in her hand. She had never encountered a dragon before that was neither afraid to die nor willing to fight back. This dragon was new to her in both behavior and appearance. She didn't know what to do. After thinking it over and raising her sword and lowering it several times, she finally dropped her sword and shield in defeat and let out a sigh. "It's no use. Slaying your type of dragon would leave a bad taste. I guess not all dragons or succubi are evil monsters." Antala smiled, snorted and then nodded her head. "I don't blame you for your attitude. Western dragons are so barbaric that they've kind of caused people to think lowly of dragons. But I happen to know there are some western dragons that aren't half bad."

Antala lowered her hand in order to allow the knight to shake it, now feeling a sense of friendship towards the one who originally attempted to slay her. The knight looked in surprise as Antala smiled down at her. "Let's start over. My name is Antala." The knight hesitated slightly but then she nodded her head and held out her hand to shake it with Antala. "Jane." She said. Antala and jane let out a laugh at what had occurred. Their confrontation was due to a misunderstanding and they had no more reason to hate each other. Perhaps a knight and dragon could be friends.

What happens now?
1241121.title: Why Can't We Be Friends?

12411211.content:
Jane poked Antala's stomach and then rubbed her chin. "All this time, I thought dragons were evil." "A lot of people think all succubi are evil," said Antala. "But I believe that no one race is truly completely good or completely evil." Jane nodded her head. "I wish that there were more people with that mindset in this world. It would be great if the world didn't care how people looked like and what people wrote and if all races could live in complete harmony. I've made my decision, Antala." Jane then held up her sword and startled Antala but then she shattered the sword on the ground and smashed it to pieces.

Antala looked at Jane as she held up her now broken sword. "From this day on," said the female knight. "I will never raise my sword against an innocent being. I will never slay another monster, no matter how strange or mysterious they appear." Antala and Jane let out a laugh and then Antala flew low and offered Jane a ride on her back. "Ever seen the world from the back of a dragon, before?" Jane looked at Antala and then looked at Antala's large belly. "Are you sure that you can still fly with that big belly." Antala nods her head. "There's more to me that meets the eye, Jane." Jane let out a laugh and then she sat down on Antala's back as the dragoness flew off into the sky.

As Antala was flying through the air, Jane looked around and was amazed at what she saw. There was a double rainbow forming a loop among clouds that resembled menageries of animals from tropical birds to exotic fish to wild cats. The two then flew above a castle made out of ivory and then passed by lion roaring into the air and then flew over a flock of unicorns that were running across the ground. Jane looked at the unicorns and spotted a Chinese-looking unicorn among the more western-looking ones. Antala and Jane shared a laugh as Jane rode on Antala's back and they passed by a tree that grew rubies for fruit and a large rose that took the shape of a dragon. As they passed the rose plant, Jane used what was left of her broken sword to cut some roses to place in Antala's hair.

Antala and Jane laughed and then Antala flew 100ft up into the air. Jane looked down and smiled. "I could totally get used to this," said the female knight. "Who says that knights and monsters can't get along." Antala nodded her head. "One day, I'd like to show you to my family." Jane nodded her head. "I'd love that, Antala. I'd love that very much." But then Antala's eye popped out and then gasped. "Oh my." She said. Antala was flying down as Jane looked in confusion.

"Is there something wrong, Antala? If you want to change back right now, you can." But Antala bit her lip. "That's the thing, Jane," she said. "I CAN'T turn back now unless I find some saltwater." Jane blinked. "Saltwater?" Antala nodded her head as she looked as far as she could for any sign of saltwater. "If I don't transform back to succubus form after 10 minutes, then I'm stuck in dragon form until I submerge myself in saltwater." "But why saltwater?" Antala shrugged her shoulders and kept looking for saltwater until she finds...
12411211.title: Two Friends in the Sky

choices: Hildy Asks Antala if She'll Accept the Dancing Girl Job
12413.content:
Antala was traveling by carriage as she arrived in the next town over. She looked out and saw that this was a town that she had never explored before. “Calliope town?” asked the succubus dragon hybrid. “I don’t think I’ve ever been here before. The carriage driver didn’t respond. He was a man in a black suit with pale bluish white skin and no face. The carriage came to a stop and then Antala decided to get out. Of course, this was proving to be a problem because the demon dragoness was having trouble getting her belly out of the front door. Antala grit her teeth and in rage breathed out smoke. She couldn't breathe out the fire and it simply built up inside her. This caused her pot belly to expand to cauldron size and bend the sides of the carriage before she fell flat on her snout.

Antala grunted and blew smoke from her nose before she stood up and then picked up her suitcase in order to walk into town as the carriage left. Calliope city was a city consisted of marble buildings that were painted in bright colors. There were also large statues of horses that were as big as buildings. Antala took out a map and laid it on her belly before she drew on it and whistled a tune to herself. The map she drew was a map of several towns she had visited throughout her travels and she was drawing Calliope Town on it. As she was trying to steady herself, she led out a grunt and accidentally jerked her pencil, causing her to draw a crooked line. Antala looked down and saw a bratty kid laughing and bouncing a ball off her belly. “Hey!” yelled Antala. The dragon-succubus hybrid snorted smoke and chased after the boy who grabbed his ball, laughed and ran away. “Come back here you little brat!” Antala had chased the boy underneath the legs of a rather large blue marble horse only to get stuck. Antala growled as the boy made a face at her and ran off.

After 10 minutes of struggling, Antala finally managed to free herself. “Well,” she said. “I can’t say that this town agrees with me much. Now I’m thirsty.” Antala saw what looked like an inn in the distance. She walked up to the inn and noticed the banner on the door. “The Dinosaur Heel Inn. Heavy on our stomaches. Light on our feet.” Antala then spotted something on the side of the window that caught her attention. “Dancing Girl wanted.” Antala scratched her head because she wasn’t sure what that meant and then the dragon succubus hybrid walked inside the inn. There she saw that the inn was completely empty. From the looks of it, they weren’t open yet. The inside of the inn looked typical of any Victorian era Inn but they were arranged to resemble a large amphitheater and there was a stage in the center. Antala looked and saw that there were six ballerinas already on the stage. Each of them was a monster girl and they all had wide bellies like Antala.

In the back row there were three monster girls tapping their feet on the ground. First of them was a tan-skinned wendigo girl with glowing silver horns and eyes and long white wild hair. Befitting a wendigo, she also had sharp teeth that were visible when her mouth was opened. Next to the wendigo girl was a gray-skinned gorgon girl with puff adders for hair and a long snake tail. The gorgon girl had a long brown pierced tongue and was wearing yellow sunglasses that were shaped like hearts to prevent her gorgon eyes from petrifying her coworkers. Next to the gorgon girl was a reddish pink furred weretiger woman with long red hair and black stripes.

There were also three dancers in the front with the leader in the center. To the left of the lead dancer was a cyan-skinned lizardwoman who resembled a moloch with large horns and a patch over her left eye and no hair. To the right of the leader of the ballerinas was a harpy woman with golden blonde hair and green feathers of a parrot with yellow talons. The leader of the dancing girls was a bright golden skinned gargoyle girl with large leather wings, long golden brown hair and a bestial-looking face that somehow still looked feminine. She was wearing a large tiara signifying her as the leader of the dancers. She also appeared to have a larger belly than the rest of them.

Antala sat down just in time for the dancing girls to stop. “Alright everyone,” said the gargoyle. “Take 5.” The girls let out a sigh and the lizardwoman turned to face her harpy friend. “Hildy sure has been working us hard lately,” said the lizardwoman. “Who would’ve thought that Naiad would quit on us?” The harpy girl gave a squawk. “You said it, Jasmine. We’ve had to pick up the slack. I just hope Hildy hires a new girl soon.” The weretigress picks up a serving tray and then she turns to see Antala. “Oh my,” she said. “It looks like we already have a customer.” Everyone turned to face Antala and the wendigo turned to face the gorgon girl. “Check out the belly on that girl, Elisa,” said the gorgon to the wendigo. “She looks like a perfect fit for the job.” The wendigo girl smiled and turned to face the gargoyle. “Yo, Hildy,” she said. "I think that... uh... whatever she is..."

Hildy, the big-bellied gargoyle simply looked at Antala before she made her move towards her. "Hello, stranger," said the innkeeper. "I don't believe I've ever seen a creature like you before." "Oh," says Antala. "Well, long story short my mother was a succubus and my father was a dragon." Hildy gave a look of surprise and the tigress dropped her jaw. "That can happen?" Antala then started to cough a few times and build up fire causing her stomach to expand to the point where it was slightly bigger than Hildy's. Hildy gave a look of shock as Antala's belly destroyed the table.

"Good grief," said Hildy. "Hmmm, I wonder." "Uh," said Antala. "Can I order now?" Then Antala noticed Hildy smiling and staring at her stomach.
12413.title: Succubus Comes to Town

14.content:
Unholy Hunger: Basicly Antala just wants to get something to eat but ends up going overboard.

Curse Of Gluttony: Antala has gotten cursed for stealing food from a witch and is doomed to consume anything and anyone that she lays her eyes on and not be able to digest anything or vomit or even burp until ether every single atom in the universe is trapped inside of her stomach or until she explodes.

The Contest: After winning an eating contest Antala decides to compete in more and more of them, Each one tougher then the last. How far will she go?

Forced To Binge: Antala has been kidnapped and is being force-fed against her will.
14.title: Food

145.content:
How about these options?

Dango Dance- Antala is at a festival on the monster-inhabited planet where she lives far above the planet of the humans. While pondering what to do, she comes across a stand that serves giant-sized dango with human faces and upon tasting the dumplings, finds them to be the sweetest most delicious thing she's ever eaten and gorges herself silly, causing her belly to get bigger. Things get worse when Antala becomes addicted to that specific dango recipe that the proprietress refuses to share and goes to extreme lengths to replicate the taste of those particular dumplings.

Fear of a Killer Tomato- Antala lives at an otherworldly farm all by herself and has been having recurring nightmares, all of which involve tomato-like ghouls tormenting her. All her life, Antala has had a crippling fear of tomatoes to the point where she screams and cries upon seeing one. Upon visiting a psychiatrist, Antala is told to literally swallow her fears and eating tomatoes. Little do both of them know, tomatoes have a very strange effect on Antala's body.
145.title: Other

1451.content:
Our story begins during a festival in an alien world populated by the monsters and demons of mythology. This planet was called Planet Chaos and it was millions of lightyears directly above the Earth where humans made their home. Chaos’s sky was littered with bright black stars that shined in the bright gold regardless of the time of day. There were oceans of water that coexisted with sees of lava and the land was made up of jagged metallic-colored Earth and magic ruins. Monsters of four different elements called this place their home. It was said that the inhabitants of Planet Chaos could appear on Earth through astral projection and were seen by the Earthlings as monsters from stories. Some monsters had dark intentions when they came to Earth. In particularly, succubi were often dispatched to this planet to wreak absolute havoc and collect the souls of the Earthlings.

However, this night they were in the middle of an alien holiday. The festival was to celebrate an event where the planet’s four moons that represented air, earth, water and fire were aligned. This was the one day of the year in which the creatures of all four elements came out and mixed together. Eerie music filled the air as torches flared with flames, geysers, tornadoes and pebbles. At four corners of the festival, the monsters of air, earth, water and fire were partaking in festive activities. In the earth corner, there was a female kappa with turquoise skin, a bright green shell and brown hair worn in a bun who was in the middle of a sumo match with an equally large lizard monster girl resembling a bright purple-skinned sungazer with long orange-red hair who was wearing a yellow and gold metallic leotard.

In the air corner of the festival, there were monster children flying kites as two monsters were having a race. One of them was a harpy resembling a red hawk with long golden red hair and a beaked face. Her opponent was a gray-skinned gargoyle with a bulging right eye and two crooked horns. The gargoyle did his best to keep up with the hawk harpy, but in the end, the hawk harpy flew through the flaming hoop that marked the finish line as several air-elemental monsters cheered loudly.

Finally. In the water corner of the festival, they were several mermaids perched upon icebergs singing a strange tune in alien language while in a junk sailing out from the shore, a Lovecraftian man resembling a brown-skinned octopus with bolts embedded in his arms was launching roman candles into the sky. These roman candles caught the attention of one young (relatively) succubus girl named Antala. She was an hourglass shaped red-skinned succubus girl with silver hair, gold cat’s eyes, E-cup breasts and enormous hips. She was wearing a festival dress that looked like a kimono made of leather with red, green and blue skeleton designs planted on it. Antala looked down at the festival and smiled. “Well,” said the succubus. “It looks like the festival is already fired up. I came around just in time.

Antala flew over the fire corner of the festival and saw a voluptuous zombie girl with the left side of her body covered in decayed blue skin, the right side covered in exposed muscle tissue and a skull for a face, dancing a Hawaiian dance and twerking as she juggled around burning batons. The succubus flew down to watch the act from a distance as several male monsters were cheering. Antala gave a scoff and then started to walk and clop her hoofed feet against the ground, passing by a brown-skinned and dark-haired werehippopotamus woman who was drinking from a transparent gourd filled with a strange alcoholic beverage that appeared to have screaming faces forming in it.

“Let’s see,” said the succubus to herself as she looked around and saw all the activities going on. “What should I do first? Maybe I could take part in the piranha-catching contest. There is no way I’m letting that double-faced coral golem beat me again this year. Or maybe I should head to the air corner and catch the air show. Possibilities, possibilities. I know. I’ll find something to eat first. There must be some yummy festival food here somewhere.” Antala looked around to see if she could find any delicious festival food to eat. There was one food cart that was serving what appeared to be cotton candy with eyeballs coated in them while another food cart served calzones with green meat coating them. However, neither one caught Antala’s attention.

But then Antala saw something that caught her eyes. It was a stand that had what appeared to be a sweet stand with several plastic eyes on top in a straight row. Antala took a closer look to see that the vendor was a baku, a Japanese monster resembling a fanged tapir. This baku woman was a fat baku with green skin and white spots. The baku woman lifted her head and then smirked at Antala. “Care for a bit of dango, young lady?” The baku woman handed Antala a stick of dango (Japanese sweet dumplings) and Antala looked to see that each dumpling had a human-like face. Additionally, unlike regular dango, these dumplings were as big as cantalopes Antala shrugged her shoulders and bit into the first bite of dango and then gagged.

Antala’s eyes popped and flames appeared on her irises before Antala’s jaw dropped and flames came out. “Oh my gosh,” said the succubus as music played all around. “This is the best dango I’ve ever eaten. I’ve never tasted anything so sweet. What’s in it?” The baku gave a snort and shook her head. “I’m sorry, but this dango recipe has been in my family for thousands of years. There’s no way I’m telling you.” Antala let out a sigh but then remembered she had five dumplings left and ate them one by one, each dumpling sweeter than the last. “May I please have another?” The baku smiled and handed Antala more dumplings as the succubus continued to gorge herself. She had developed a taste for the dumplings and was blissfully unaware of the potbelly that was forming.

What happens next?
1451.title: Dango Dance

1452.content:
Antala was tossing and turning in bed on her farm and screaming and sweating as she had a terrifying nightmare. “Stay back! Get away from me! Get away!” In Antala’s dream there were several creatures chasing her, resembling tomato headed grim reapers that were snarling and holding out large scythes. The leader of the tomato reapers had what looked like a bear trap where his teeth should be and was snapping his jaws as he came closer and closer to the terrified succubus. “Stay back!” yelled Antala between screams. “Stay back! Suddenly, a large hand came out of the ground and grabbed Antala’s foot. Antala screamed as a tomato headed zombie came out of the ground laughing evilly, showing an eyeball on its uvula right before a creature resembling a cross between a tomato zombie and a fallen angel came out and approached her with a machete. Antala screamed until she woke up and stood up in her bed, panting heavily.

These tomato nightmares were a recurring problem. Antala had an unexplained and illogical fear of tomatoes. It wasn’t a problem before, but somehow tomato seeds got mixed in with her potato seeds and she had accidentally grown an entire field of the red, green and yellow fruit (or vegetables, tomatoes are a rather grey area on that). She walked up to the mirror in her kitchen and splashed her face with water before she breathed in and out. “Not again,” she said. “Not again. This was almost as bad as that nightmare where those tomatoes forced me to watch that awful show with the teenage nanny. I’m putting a stop to this right now, even if it kills me.” Antala was about to leave but then she looked at her watch and then sat down in front of a television. “I guess I could tend to my problem after watching this show on the Mystery Channel I’ve only been able to watch because of my insomnia. Maybe these nightmares aren’t so... oh who am I kidding, I’m getting rid of them.”

The next morning, Antala was outside a waiting room ready to see a psychiatrist. Outside the waiting room, there were several strange cases, such as a Frankenstein’s monster that hid under a chair when a bolt of lightning suddenly struck outside. There was also a turkey harpy who was twitching nervously and spinning her head around like an owl. Antala looked ahead and saw a gargoyle wearing a Napoleon hat, with the receptionist looking at him and mumbling “Not another one.”. The receptionist then pressed a button and turned to Antala. “Antala,” she said. “The doctor will see you now.” Antala sprung up and slowly walked to the psychiatrist’s office.

The psychiatrist in charge was a large werehippo who was three times as large as Antala and if she was Antala’s height, she would weigh 1000lbs. She had pitch black skin and long blonde hair and was wearing a pair of rectangular glasses. She also had what appeared to be a tattoo of three diamonds on her right breasts from what could be seen from her clothes. The doctor blinked as she looked at Antala. “Ms. Antala,” she said. “My receptionist tells me that you have quite an unusual phobia.” Antala gave a gulp. “Well, you see, Dr. Keeler,” said the nervous succubus. “I have a fear that is getting in the way of my work and is making it hard for me to sleep.” The hippopotamus psychiatrist nodded her head. “I understand you live on a farm? What is the fear? Chickens? Cows? Crows?” Antala held her head down and gave a gulp. “It’s tomatoes.”  

Dr. Keeler looked at her patient and raised an eyebrow. “Tomatoes?” she asked as if it was the most absurd thing she’d ever heard (which it was). Antala nodded her head. “I have a fear of tomatoes.” The doctor rolls her eyes and taps her enormous belly. “I see. Any particular reason for this fear?” Antala bit her lip. “I honestly don’t know where this fear actually stems from.” Dr. Keeler let out a sigh. “I’ll be frank,” said the werehippo. “This is perhaps the strangest case I’ve ever seen. In cases like this, confronting the fear is the best antidote and I know where to start.” Antala was initially confused until the psychiatrist held out her arm and opened her hand to reveal a...
1452.title: Fear of a Killer Tomato

choices: Yes. She Gets Belly Bloat in Seconds
No. She Needs to Eat More Green Tomatoes
14523.content:
It was a large and green tomato that shined like a star. Antala took one look at the tomato in Dr. Keeler's hands and then her eyes widened. She looked as though she was about to have a panic attack. Seeing that green tomato made her briefly suffer a nightmarish fantasy where aliens with green tomato heads invaded her farm in a flying saucer and bore eyeless faces with no lips and jagged teeth as they hissed loudly and attacked her. Antala could imagine those tomato aliens pulling her apart right before she let out a loud scream and snapped back to reality. She folded her wings into a cape and covered herself as she held her tail and shivered.

Dr. Keeler rolled her eyes and let out a sigh. "Oh brother," the talking hippopotamus psychiatrist thought to herself. "I can tell that I've got a wild one here. This is going to take some persuasion." The werehippopotamus let out a snort before she let out steam from her nostrils, cleared her throat and spoke. "Ms. Antala," said Dr. Keeler. "Sometimes we have to face our fears head on. I once knew a man who was afraid of heights but conquered the fear by climbing up a water tower. In your case, the best thing to do about your... tomato phobia... is to swallow your fears. Literally in this case."

Antala gave a look of even more horror. Never before in her life had she ever thought about eating a tomato. She never even had ketchup on her french fries. "Me?" asked Antala. "Eat a tomato? There has got to be another way." Dr. Keeler sat down in both her seats before she shook her head. "Antala. What you're afraid of is nothing more than a harmless food stuff. If you can eat just one tomato, then it will be the first step towards conquering your fears and getting rid of them forever. I want you to eat green tomatoes for the next 24 hours and then come back and see me tomorrow. Now shut up and eat this tomato." Antala stared at the green tomato in Dr. Keeler's hands and was hesitant. "But Dr. Keeler," she said. "This tomato is green. It isn't even ripe."

At this point, Dr. Keeler lost her patience and let out a loud roar, revealing her enormous, sharp and yellow stained teeth. Antala didn't want to get the doctor any angrier and she stuffed the green tomato into her mouth and then gagged before she held her neck. In her haste to eat the tomato and conquer her fears, Antala had forgotten to actually chew the tomato. Antala grunted and groaned before she finally swallowed the tomato and then huffed and puffed and coughed a few times. "How do you feel?" asked Dr. Keeler. Antala just coughed a few times. "Like I'm going to be sick." Dr. Keeler gave a snort. "Well, nevertheless, you won't get over your fears unless you eat lots and lots of tomatoes. Come back tomorrow and we'll discuss your progress." Antala nodded her head and then walked away, leaving Dr. Keeler to her next patient.

As Antala walked out, in walked a male weretiger that was holding his head. "You gotta help me, Doctor," said the tiger man. "I've been seeing stripes everywhere I go." Dr. Keeler let out a grumble and held her head. "Why me," thought the hippo woman to herself. "Why all the time me?" As Antala left the doctor's office, she held her stomach and moaned. Something was not sitting right about the green tomato she swallowed and it wasn't just indigestion.

Now, does her body undergo any immediate change?
14523.title: (Un) Healthy and Green

145232.content:
Antala's stomach rumbled slightly, but it stopped it seconds. "Oh," groaned Antala. "I really hate tomatoes. What is Dr. Keeler thinking. Oh." Antala clutched her stomach in pain before she walked out of the hospital and then started to fly away. She didn't notice it at the time, but her stomach had begun to bulge slightly. However, at this point, it was hard to say whether or not it was due to the tomato that she ate. Antala flapped her leather signs to reach the air and she looked down to see a cart that was filled with green tomatoes and as she looked down, she imagined the tomatoes with sharp fangs and glowing eyes. They hissed like cobras and opened their jaws up so much that they split in half and exposed snake-like tongues. Antala's eyes widened as she saw the tomatoes for more than they actually were.

In reality, the tomatoes were nothing more than ordinary green tomatoes that were being peddled by a kamaitachi, a Japanese weasel-like yokai. He was having no luck and there was an obese pink-furred wereleopard girl dressed as a policewoman badgering him. "You expect anyone to buy these tomatoes?" asked the leopard cop. "They're green! It's against the law to sell unripe produce. You should at least wait until they turn yellow before you try and sell them. I'll let it slide this time, but I'm warning you, nobody is going to buy green tomatoes." That's what the pink-furred police leopard thought, but then Antala flew down from the sky and nervously bit her lip. "I'll buy them." Both the leopard policewoman and the weasel fruit vendor looked in surprise.

- - -

Antala was soon welling up with tears of fear as she bought the entire cart of tomatoes and swallowed every last green one. The green tomatoes however, were clearly not meant to be consumed in such excess and Antala quickly became ill as she held her stomach and groaned. "This was not a good idea," groaned the young succubus. "I don't think I'm any closer to breaking my fear of tomatoes."
