Antala groaned and then she finally arrived home where she collapsed in front of her front door and had to crawl onto the verandah before she took out her cell phone. She decided to give Dr. Keeler a quick buzz.

At that moment, the werehippopotamus psychiatrist had just stepped out of the shower and was wrapped in three towels. "Dr. Keeler," said Antala. "I did what you said. I ate an entire cart of green tomatoes and they just made me sick." "I didn't tell you to eat that many tomatoes, Antala. You need to pace yourself. If you're not careful, you'll make yourself gravely ill. It's like that human my sister ate the other day that made her sick. You can't expect to get rid of your fear of tomatoes so quickly. It takes time. From now on, try to control how many tomatoes you eat at a time." Dr. Keeler hung up and Antala felt her stomach in pain. "Now she tells me."

Suddenly, there was a ripping noise and then Antala gasped. She looked down and saw that her shirt was coming apart. Her belly was getting bigger and bigger and swelling. "Oh no!" yelled Antala. Antala screamed so much that her skin turned as green as an unripened tomato." Once her skin was completely green, Antala looked at her belly and saw it was now as big and heavy as a...
145232.title: The Tomato Incident

15.content: What else could her belly fill with?
15.title: Other

151.content:
Let's enter a Dark realm and see what ideas lie here. (Darkness here can mean the absence of light, or dark and evil concepts, like nightmares.)

The Mistress of Shadows: In this story, Antala is an evil woman who has the power to control shadows. She can make them do anything, but her favorite thing to do is this: if she consumes a living beings shadow, that person becomes her mindless slave. There's just one catch to that ability: she has no way of removing the shadows from her belly, so he belly just grows and grows.

The Dream Eater: In this story, Antala is a benevolent succubus who has an interesting ability: she can consume the nightmares of any sleeping person. When she does, the nightmares are replaced with sweet dreams. She then stores the nightmares in her belly, so she can deal with them later. (This story is RedHurricane's idea.)
151.title: Darkness

choices: Search the dark for more choices
1513.content:
Fear the Light - In this story, Antala is a kind hearted succubus who suffers from heliophobia, an extreme fear of light. Contact with any form of bright lights, from sunlight to flashlights, sends her into an extreme panic. One day, a friend gives her the power to cast darkness around her, allowing her to go out without an umbrella or other forms of light blocking. But there's a catch: when not using her power, the darkness is stored in her belly.

No Gloom, No Doom - In this story, Antala is a Perky Goth who loves to make the people around her happy. Luckily, she has power to collect the dark emotions in a persons heart (stuff like sadness, anger, fear, ect.) and store them in her massive belly. So she goes around, collecting these dark feelings and making people happy. Just making people smile makes her happy (though the huge belly is a nice bonus too).
1513.title: More Dark Options

152.content:
Let's see how Antala will fill up her belly with fizzy, carbonated beverages.

Carbonated Workout - In this story, Antala is a fitness freak who is obsessed with keeping in shape. During a normal workout day, she comes across a strange workout plan that says that, if you fill you belly up with huge amounts of soda, your workouts will be twice as effective. She gives it a try, and quickly becomes addicted to the routine, even keeping the belly when she's not working out (even though the workout does not work). (This story is reserved for redhurricane).

Belly Love - In this story, Antala is a serious tomboy, playing and watching sports while chugging soda. One day, one of her friends gives her a bet: if she can spend a whole day with an enormous belly full of soda, she will get $100. She accepts the challenge and wins, but finds that she loves having a huge, soda filled belly, and uses her magic to keep it. (I will be writing this story.)
152.title: Soda

1521.content:
Antala the succubus was dressed up in her usual gray leotard and leg warmers and was running on the treadmill as fast as her hooved succubus feet could take her. It was like this at least twice a day at the Undertown gym. Of all of the monsters, succubi were under the most pressure to look decent and to stay in shape. Antala was even moreso than other succubi and put herself at such pressure to remain in good shape that at one point she passed out mid workout from dehydration and the owner had to call the paramedics.

However, Antala didn't learn from the experience and was sweating up a storm on the treadmill when it suddenly turned off. "Hey!" yelled the succubus. "What gives?" The weretiger owner let out a slight growl and walked up to Antala. "I turned off the treadmill, Antala," he said. "You're taking this way too far." "Bite me," said Antala as she grit her teeth. "I'm only looking out for my health." "If you keep going this way," said the tiger man. "You're going to destroy your health. You gotta chill down." Antala stuck her tongue out at the tiger man as he walked away.

Little did Antala know that there was a couple of gargoyles on a nearby building that were watching her. One of them was a pitch whited skinned female gargoyle with rainbow streaks in her hair and an hourglass figure wearing a white tunic and the other was a black skinned male gargoyle with flying-squirrel like wings, a curved neck and no hair, wearing a blue loincloth. The white gargoyle gave a smirk as she looked down at Antala.

"A perfect target," said the white gargoyle. "Don't you think, Schwarz." "I don't get it, Weiss," said the black gargoyle to his female counterpart. "What's the deke this time?" Weiss lets out a laugh. "Think of it as a social experiment. Monsters can be so desperate that their feeble minds will lead them to believe anything. If somebody promises them a cure for their problems, they'll..." "I think Succubi are the ones who are supposed to convince people to sign over their souls." Weiss however, held up a briefcase and shook it as Schwarz looked in confusion.

Antala was then jogging down the street and this gave Weiss the opportunity to fly down and land in front of the succubus, catching Antala by surprise as she gave a smirk. "Hello." Weiss said. Before Antala could say anything, Weiss started to walk around and inspect the young (by succubus standards) succubus. "I see you're a working girl. Oh my." "What?" asked Antala in worry before she gags.

Weiss started to feel around Antala's thighs. "Now," she said. "That's not good. Not good at all. You've got quite the thunder thighs." Antala blushed and looked back at her rear end as she blushed. "Before long," said Weiss. "You'll be as big as a bus." "B-But that's not possible," said Antala. "I exercise three times a day." Weiss just shook her head and smirked. "That's not going to matter much. However, I do have a proposition."

Antala was suddenly very interested. Weiss held out her briefcase and opened it up to reveal several bottles of soda. "Soda pop?!" yelled Antala. "WTF! I want to lose weight!" "And you will," said Weiss. "Sometimes you have to get bigger to get smaller." Antala just blinked. "I don't follow." She said.

Weiss held up a bottle of the soda and smiled. "This is a new experimental soda. It will increase the size of your stomach, but it will also make your body stronger, go beyond its limits. That way you'll be able to work out twice as hard without killing yourself. The first one is free."

Antala didn't know what to think about it. Weiss's proposal was screwy, but there was a chance that it could've worked. So Antala, believing Weiss reached in the briefcase and took a bottle of...
1521.title: Carbonated Workout

15213.content:
Antala grinned a bit as she pulled out a bottle of grape soda. As much as she hated to admit it, being the fitness freak she is, she did love grape soda, allowing herself some from time to time.

"Ah, excelent choice. Grape is a popular flavor. Now, here's my number." Weiss said as she handed a card to Antala. "Call me when you see results. Then we'll see if we can do proper business."

"Thanks, um, I'm sorry. I didn't get your name." Antala said.

"Call me Lauren." Weiss lied. She then grinned and flew away.

Antala looked at the bottle, then walked home.

Weiss had landed back on her pearch next to Schwarz. "See? Hook, line, and sinker."

Schwarz stared at Weiss. "She did seem a bit supicious of you."

"Doesn't matter." Weiss replies. "Once she drinks that, she'll get addicted to it. Then she'll be begging for more."
-----------
A little while later, Antala returned home. Her house was filled up with workout equipment. Neighbors often complained about the noise from her machines.

Antala sat down at her kitchen counter and looked at the bottle. The label on it read:

'Workout Soda! Just drink, get a big belly, and you'll be a workout machine! No more limits! Just down the entire bottle in one go, and the soda will do the rest!'

Antala picked up the bottle and opened it to get a smell. It certainly did smell like grape. She was still concerned, but if this worked, she'd never have to worry about passing out again. Throwing caution to the wind, she put the bottle to her mouth and started chugging. It took her only a few seconds to finish it.

She waited a few seconds, but nothing seemed to happen. She was about to throw the bottle in anger when she felt a gurgling in her stomach. She looked down and was shocked to see her stomach begin to expand. She dropped the bottle and clutched her stomach. She heard a ripping sound from her leotard as her belly continued to grow.

Eventually, it began to slow down, her belly finally reaching the size of a...
15213.title: The Scam Begins

1523.content:
Big Bellied Model - In this story, Antala gets a call from her friend Georgia (from redhurrican's story Monster Arms) asking for her help. Georgia needs a new model for her sculptures and wants Antala to help. She agrees to the job, but learns that the sculptures Georgia is making all need to have big bellies. But that's not a problem: Georgia is from a world of giant monsters, and their soda bottles are hundreds of miles tall.

A Sweltering Idea - In this story, Antala's home dimension is undergoing a massive heat wave. Everyone is dying to find a way to get cool. Through this, Antala gets an idea: she uses her magic to fill her belly with cool soda, and then bottle it and sell it to everyone. The plan works, but soon Antala's "belly soda" becomes popular and demand skyrockets.
1523.title: Other

15231.content:
Antala was just stepping out of the shower when she got a call on her telephone. She checked the caller ID and was surprised to see that it read "Georgia". Antala snatched it up and put it up to her ear. "Antala here." "Hi, Ant," said Georgia. "What's up?" On the other side of the line was Georgia, an hourglass shaped gorgon with with an hourglass shape, D-Cup Breasts and a round heart shaped butt. She had gray skin and black cobras for hair. She was wearing blue jeans and an apron but no shirt or bra. She was busy working on a sculpture of some kind.

"Not much is going on here, Georgia," says Antala. "What's the word from my favorite gorgon." "Well," says Georgia. "I've just been commissioned to make a succubus sculpture for a very rich client and I figured that..." "Oh," says Antala. "So you want me to be a model. Say no more." "But Antala, there's something you need to know.." Before Georgia could finish, Antala hung up and got dressed in a purple bikini with spiked shoulders and hearts on the nipples. It was there, she walked into her closet, revealing a rainbow colored crack on the wall.

You see, Georgia didn't just live in a different city as Antala, she lived in a different dimension. As Antala walked into the crack, she found herself in Georgia's apartment and saw in front of her were the painted nails on Georgia's toes, each one bigger than she was. In Georgia's dimension, the monsters of mythology were as big as skyscrapers and the smallest full-grown monster was 300ft tall. Georgia herself was 550ft tall and was looking down at Antala before she picked up the tiny succubus.

Antala looked around Georgia's workshop to see there were sculptures of all kinds of monsters. There was a sculpture of a gargoyle's skeleton, a sculpture of Siamese twin mummies and one of four conjoined mandrakes, one for each season. "Nice stuff you have here, Georgie," says Antala as she stands in Georgia's palm. Georgia gives a smile as her snakes hiss. Georgia made she she was wearing her yellow sunglasses as she looked at Antala. Being a gorgon, Georgia had a fatal petrifying gaze that required her to wear sunglasses to prevent herself from petrifying non-gorgons.

"So," says Antala as she holds her hands in the air. "How should I pose?" "Uh, there's something you should know, Antala. My client has a belly fetish. I need a succubus with a big belly, preferably to the point of immobility." Antala lets out a scoff and taps her hips. "Excuse me?" "N-Now, don't be angry Antala. We've been friends for 2 years now. You were the first to come to mind." "Don't tell me you brought me here just to stuff me like a turkey, Georgia."

Georgia walked towards her kitchen and there were several bottles of soda lined in a row. "It won't be as bad as you think. I'll just inflate you with a bottle of Ghoula Gola." Georgia placed Antala on the table and Antala walked up to a bottle of soda as big as a grain silo. "You're the artist," she said with a sigh. Georgia was opening a bottle but before she could pour it into a glass, somebody was knocking on the door.

"Dammit," says Georgia. "Nefernina. I forgot it was rent day. I'll be back." Antala had heard about Nefernina, Georgia's landlady. She was a giant pear-shaped mummy who ruled the Monster Arms apartment building with an iron fist wrapped in gauze. According to Georgia, Nefernina was the worst landlady in the world.

While Georgia was busy tending to Nefernina, Antala took the first bottle of soda and tipped it over to stuff herself.

It was a bottle of...
15231.title: Big Bellied Model

152311.content:
Antala spotted a bottle of cherry soda and grunted as she tried to tip it over. It was as big as a grain silo. Antala was beginning to realize that this world of giant monsters had some disadvantages for regular-sized monsters. But Antala was not about to give up so soon. Instead, she noticed some dental floss that Georgia had left laying around and got an idea. She walked up and decided to fasten it into a lasso.

Georgia at the time had opened her front door and saw that on the outside was her mummified landlady, Nefernina. However, Nefernina looked different. She looked like she had lost weight and she had a sad look on her face. "Nefernina?" asked Georgia in confusion. Nefernina let out a sigh. "Good day to you, Georgia. How are you?" Georgia gave a blink and then gestured to her landlady. "Oh," said Nefernina. "That's right. I almost forgot why I actually came here. Listen, Georgia. Just give me the rent." Georgia in confusion, reached into her pocket just as Antala had finally put her lasso together and was getting ready to tip over the bottle of cherry soda.

"Nefernina?" asked Georgia. "Are you feeling alright." Nefernina shrugged her shoulders. "Ra only knows, Georgia. I'm just wondering what I'm doing with my afterlife. I've decided that maybe I should issue a rule against eating humans in this building. Lupa won't like it, but let's face it, she could stand to lose some weight. I've also decided I'm going to mellow out and be nicer to R.L. Well, see you around." Nefernina took the rent and left, leaving Georgia confused. "That's odd," said Georgia. "Nefernina isn't acting like herself. It's as if there's something grim on the horizon. What do you think, Antala? Antala?"

Georgia turned and gasped because Antala managed to lasso the bottle of cherry soda and tipped it over. "Oh geez!" Antala had knocked over the soda and the cap came off. The soda begun to pour down and cover Antala as she yelled. The cherry soda fell into Antala's mouth and Antala begun to gurgle as she drank the bottle. Georgia ran forward and attempted to stop Antala but by the time that Antala got there, the bottle was empty and Antala's belly was now as big as a....
152311.title: Cherry Bomb

1523111.content:
Antala's belly was at that point the size of a bowling ball and she was dizzy and weak. Drinking all that soda at once wasn't good for her and the succubus was panting as her giant friend looked down at her in horror. "Oh no!" she yelled. "Antala!" Georgia held up Antala as Antala was moaning and holding her stomach. "I think that I'm going to be sick," she said. "Oh, who am I kidding. I am sick." Antala begun to huff and puff and Georgia looks down in horror. "Oh no. I have got to get you to Chel."

Georgia picked up Antala with one hand and held her as if she was a baseball and ran down the hallway to find a room labeled "Chel". "Chel!" yelled Georgia as she desperately pounded on the door. "Chel! Please open the door, Chel!" The door opened to reveal a rather plain but still cute looking yeti girl with long white fur covering her body and pink highlights in her hair. "Georgia?" asked the yeti. "What's wrong?" Chel then spotted Antala in Georgia's hand and gasped at what she saw.

"Georgia!" yelled Chel in shock. "What on.. what in the name of Heaven and Earth is that thing!?" "She's not a thing!" yelled Georgia. "She's my friend! Listen, she comes from a parallel world where monsters are for the most part no bigger than humans. Or maybe we're from the alternate world. Listen! That doesn't matter! Antala drank an entire bottle of my cherry soda and she looks like she's really sick." Antala gurgled and sputtered in place and Chel looked down and then she saw tears appear in Georgia's eyes (though she had to look through Georgia's sunglasses as Georgia's naked eyes would turn her to stone. Chel took Antala and nodded her head. "Don't worry. I'm a nurse."

Georgia waited for 20 minutes on Antala and was very worried. She was twitching her fingers and pacing like an expectant father. She was worried that since Antala was not from this world, the cherry soda would harm her. As Georgia was trying to figure out where this was going, Chel's door opened up and Chel was carrying a still sickly but stable Antala in a device that resembled a baby carriage of some sort. "Antala!" yelled Georgia. "Chel... is?" Antala smiled and held a thumb up at Georgia. "It's nothing serious to worry about. Antala just had a stomach ache. But I don't think she should be modeling for a while." Antala smiled and then held up another thumb. "I'm A-OK."

Georgia let out a sigh. "Oh, thank all that is divine and good. I'm glad your alright. Come on, Antala." Georgia was handed Antala's carriage and then Chel spoke to her. "Antala needs to take these antacids in half an hour. Then she'll be okay. But I recommend she lay low. Also, by some abnormality, her belly seems to have permanently swelled to such a big size. I'd recommend be careful and go easy on the soda." Georgia nodded her head and then took Antala back to her apartment.
1523111.title: Bowling Ball Full of Cherry

152312.content:
Antala sniffed the soda and then nodded her head. "Orange soda," she said. "One of my favorites." Antala started to chug the soda while Georgia was busy with Nefernina. "You have to admit, Nefernina," said Georgia as she handed Nefernina money that looked like black dollar bills. "One hundred and fifty skulls a month is kinda steep." "Then it's a good thing that people are willing to pay so much for those ridiculous baubles you make," says the mummy giantess. "You're lucky I don't charge you for making a mess of the place." As Antala drank the orange soda, she was listening in on the conversation.

"What a jerk." She thought to herself. Suddenly Antala hiccuped and then held her mouth as she groaned. She looked up to see that to her surprise she had drank the entire bottle of orange soda. She then looked down to see her stomach was completely swollen. It seemed to be twice as wide as she was tall and she could barely stand. "Oh," said Antala as she felt her red skin becoming more orange in color. "Ugh. Ooh." Antala felt her head spinning and even belched up a few orange bubbles before she felt her stomach. It seemed like the soda was still bubbling inside of her. "I guess bigger soda means bigger fizz." She said.

Georgia walked into the kitchen and looked in surprise. "Wow," she said. "Antala. You know how to put the soda away." Georgia actually lifts up the bloated succubus and Antala holds her stomach in pain. "So," says Antala. "Is this big enough for you." Georgia shook her head. "Not quite." "What?!" yells Antala. "My belly is so big I can barely stand." "You don't know my client that well," says Georgia. "I've been to his mansion. His maids are built like sumo wrestlers. The guy is absolutely deviant."

The gorgon giantess then squeezed the tiny succubus to force her mouth open and then shoved another open bottle of orange soda into Antala's mouth as if she was bottle-feeding her like a baby. It wasn't long until Antala's stomach had expanded to the point where her arms and legs were the size of toothpicks and her skin and hair had becoming more orange in color. The succubus felt her stomach and could feel the bubbles inside of it. "My stomach is killing me," said Antala. "Georgia. This isn't going to take long is it?"

Antala was standing on a pedestal while Georgia had a second pedestal ready and put a block of marble. "It won't be long now, Antala," said the gorgon giantess. "Just pose like a Greek goddess." Antala stood in a sultry pose as she took off her bra. "I said Greek goddess," said Georgia. "Not pole dancer." Antala held her hands to cover her breast and stood like Aphrodite. "Perfect."

Georgia started to chip away at the marble while Antala stood in place, not exactly easy given the amount of soda bubbling in Antala's belly. Georgia had the general body shape done and was now chipping in Antala's wings. She would've continued but there was a knock at the door. Georgia's snakes hissed in response and Antala grit her teeth. "Who the hell could that be?" asked Georgia. Antala let out a moan as Georgia got up to walk towards the door. As Georgia opened the door, there was a 300ft tall olive Ridley sea turtle-based kappa with bluish hair smiling at her.

But Georgia wasn't happy at all to see this kappa woman. "Shelly!" she yelled. "What the hell do you want you bitch." Shelly let out a laugh. "Come on, Georgia, is that any way to treat a friend?" "You and I aren't friends, Shelly," says Georgia. "Whatever you're selling, I'm not buying." Antala leaned forward to get a good look. From what Georgia told her, Shelly was a con artist and had swindled her once before. It was rather bold of the kappa to try and cheat anyone where she lived since there was a cop on the third floor; an orange skinned and white haired gargoyle woman by the name of Petra and at 1000ft tall, Petra was the biggest monster in the building.

While Georgia and Shelly were arguing, Antala leaned forward but because of her bigger belly she fell back too far and yelled. She fell on the ground and started to roll across the floor. The succubus rolled under and between Georgia and Shelly's legs and into the hallway. "Georgia!" yelled Antala. "I...! Ouch!" Antala then found herself being kicked upstairs absentmindedly by a giant cat sith girl who resembled a Siamese cat dressed up as a biker. That was Patsy, a biker who was in a gang of werecats called the Fire Cats.

Patsy had kicked the big-bellied succubus upstairs and Antala rubbed her head before she heard stomping. She then looked up and saw...
152312.title: Orange Soda Balloon

choices: Let's Pop More Choices (I'm so sorry for that pun)
15233.content: The True Belly Dancer - In this story, Antala is living in modern Egypt and working as a Belly Dancer. Her graceful moves and kind personality catch the attention of a soda company. They ask her if she can promote their new line of sodas. Strapped for cash, Antala accepts. Her ad soon becomes popular and she gets all the soda she wants. But she finds the soda has an odd effect on Succubi: the soda never digests and just accumulates in her belly.
15233.title: Still more choices

152332.content: The Soda Curse Prank - In this story, Antala is asked by a friend to drink 10 large bottles of soda. Though confused, Antala manages to do just that, leaving her with a bloated stomach. But unknown to Antala, her friend has decided to prank her by placing a curse on her. Soon, Antala finds out the curse is two-fold: one, the soda in her belly will magically multiply in spurts, and two, she can't stop belching. Now Antala must find a way to reverse the curse.
152332.title: More Carbonation

1523321.content:
"Come on Antala, it'll be fun." Rita said.

Antala looked at her friend in confusion. Rita, a green-skinned, chubby Maker Succubus with short red hair, had just walked up to her put down 10 large bottles of soda, and asked Antala to drink all 10 in one sitting.

"And you want me to do this why?" Antala asked.

"Because I only needed one bottle of soda, bought eleven by accident, and need to get rid of these ten." Rita explained.

"How do you accidentally buy ten extra bottles?" Antala asked.

"I wasn't paying attention." Rita said. "Come on, please? I'll take you to dinner if you do this."

Antala sighed. There was no getting through to Rita here. Antala grabbed the first bottle. "My stomach's going to hate me for this." She said. Then she removed the cap, and started chugging the soda."

Rita watched, a little smirk forming. She lied about accidentally buying extra bottles. She had bought the 10 bottles hoping to prank Antala. Rita had placed a curse on all 10 bottles, but it would only take effect when all 10 were drunk.

Antala finished the first bottle, and moved on to the second. As she drunk the soda, Rita saw Antala's belly begin to swell a little. This was only one part of the curse.

After 40 minutes, Antala finished all 10 bottles. Her stomach had inflated to basketball size. She rubbed it and sighed.

"I can't believe- *URP*- I did that." Antala said, only to cover her mouth after her burp. "Sorry, that was- *URP* - rude of me!"

"It's ok." Rita said. "Well bye!" Then she ran off.

Antala was confused, but shrugged and walked away, still belching.

A ways away, Rita laughed. The curse was in effect. Now, Antala's belly would inflate with more soda at random times, and she would never stop belching. Rita couldn't wait for the humor.
----------
A little later, Antala arrived at...
1523321.title: A Weird Soda Prank

153.content:
Here's an interesting choice. These are the story options (and in case you are wondering, yes, Antala can get drunk.)

Main Attraction - In this story, Antala is a bartender at a small bar. Business is not doing very well, and the owner, Antala's girlfriend, is considering closing up for good. Not wanting to lose the bar, Antala comes up with an interesting idea: she can draw in the big belly loving demographic by using her magic to create huge quantities of beer in her belly and dancing. The plan works, and the small bar becomes a huge hit.

Big Belly, Bigger Ego - In this story, Antala is convinced by a friend to join an international drinking competition, thinking that her succubus powers would give them an edge. She agrees, and soon rockets in fame, becoming the most famous competitive drinker in the world. But all that fame soon has an effect on her ego - and belly.
153.title: Alcohol

154.content:
Here are some storylines for filling Antala's belly with gold. (Either solid gold or liquid gold. I don't think gas gold exists.)

Worth her Weight in Gold (yeah, unoriginal title, I know) - In this story, Antala is a gold smuggler. During a job, the police manage to find her and try to stop her. In desperation, she swallows all the gold she had and tries to escape. She manages to escape, but now has a problem: the gold is stuck in her belly.


Greed is Not Good - In this story, Antala is the succubus representative of greed, and is tasked to tempt a businesswoman into greed. However, the businesswoman is clever, and manages to turn Antala's magic against her. Now Antala is cursed, her belly magically filling with gold coins. She must find a way to break the spell and get rid of the coins.
154.title: Gold

1541.content:
Antala the succubus was busy placing all the stolen gold she had into a suitcase as the radio was playing. "In other news, police are still on the look out for one hundred gold bars stolen from the Yokaitown Mint on the West coast of San Kassir. The suspect is believed to be 5' 10". Local witnesses describe the culprit as a red skinned and silver haired monster in the demon grouping. Most likely an incubus or succubus, depending on the gender. Citizens are advised to be on the lookout."

Antala looked out the window and saw that down the street there was a police cruiser that looked like the kind that gargoyles would drive. Antala looked at her briefcase filled with gold coins and took a handful of them as she smiled. "Suspect is believed to be seeking to fence the gold in Hellseid, North of City limits." Continued the radio.

Antala then took a press of some kind and used it on the last gold bar she had to turn the gold into more coins. "Good thing they didn't know I stole this press along with the gold," she said with a smirk. "They're looking for gold bars, not gold coins." Antala let out a sinister laugh before she heard a knocking from downstairs. "Ms. Antala!?" called a voice. "Ms. Antala! This is the police! We have some questions for you."

Antala gasped and then looked out her window to see two large male gargoyles dressed in police uniforms outside her front door. One was a pudgy tealish blue skinned gargoyle with spikes running down his head and large fangs while the other was a red gargoyle with a beaked mouth and white hair. "We're not here to arrest you," said the red gargoyle as he continued to knock. "Maybe."

"Crap." Thought Antala to herself. "Stupid gargoyles cops. If they see this gold, I'm history." Antala looked around to find any possible way of disposing of the gold. First, she looked out the window. She could've tossed out the gold, but the cops would've seen it. She could've hidden it under her bed but they were cops, it was their job to search the whole house and throwing it down the drain was out of the question.

Antala was sweating before the red gargoyle knocked again. "Open this door or we're breaking it down! We have a warrant!" Antala saw the gold and then got a desperate idea and gulped. "What other choice do I have?" she asked. Antala grunted as she held the briefcase and opened it up before grabbing the gold by the handful and shoveling every last coin down her throat.

At this point the red gargoyle was getting impatient. "I don't think she's opening the door, Bennett." Said the teal gargoyle. "Then I'm breaking the #&@%ing door down." The red gargoyle was ready to punch the door open but then Antala opened it with a smile. "Is there a problem officers?" she asked.

Both gargoyle cops looked in surprise because Antala's stomach had swelled so much that she looked like she was pregnant with octuplets. "Uh," said the red cop as he tipped his hat. "I'm terribly sorry to trouble a woman in your position, ma'am. But we're here on word from a witness and have to search your house." Antala gave a smirk. "Search away." She said.
1541.title: Worth her Weight in Gold

15411.content:
Antala had to fight back the urge to laugh. The gargoyle cops were going to search her house for the stolen gold and it was in her stomach. She patted her large belly as the police went to work with the search. "I can't believe that actually worked," the succubus thought to herself. "Stupid cops." After two hours, the police had almost finished the search.

"Damn," grumbled the red gargoyle to himself. "Looks like that witness didn't know what he was talking about. Cyclopses. I swear that an eye that big should've been able to pick up something." "Anything in the kitchen, Bill? She could be hiding it in the fridge." The blue gargoyle walked out carrying the gold press in one hand and a chicken leg in the other. The former made Antala very worried.

"What the heck is this?" asked the blue gargoyle. "That?" asked Antala nervously. "That's a meat grinder." "Doesn't look like any meat grinder I've ever seen." "It's a new model." The cop nodded his head and put down the press as Antala snatched it with her tail, glad that the police bought that lie, just as the red gargoyle was walking downstairs. "Looks like you're clean, Ms. Antala. I'm really sorry for the trouble."

Antala smiled innocently as a succubus could. "Everyone makes mistakes," she said. "Good luck catching that smuggler." Both cops left Antala's house. "Well that sucks," said the red one. "Wait'll I get that Summers. All we did was crank call a pregnant woman. I feel like a complete and utter jerk." "Don't beat yourself up," said the blue gargoyle. "I still say we have the wrong description. I'm telling you we're looking for a man." "Shut up."

Once the police were gone, Antala gave a smirk. "Looks like I won't be having any trouble with the cops for a while. Now to... oh dang." Antala held up her bloated stomach as the gold shook inside and she let out a groan. "I'll just have to cross this bridge when I get there. Now I've just got to meet the fence..."
15411.title: The Search

154111.content:
About an hour after the incident with the cops, Antala was driving down the road (the driver seat put all the way back to accomidate her new gut). The fence said they would be waiting at an abandoned gas station out of town. There was only one, so she knew where to go.

Eventuall, she found the place. And it really was abandoned. The gas pumps were gone and the place was falling apart. Waiting outside was a pear shaped werecat in a biker outfit and sunglasses. Antala assumed that was the fence.

She pulled up and rolled down the window. The werecat walked up.

"You Antala?" She asked.

"Yep. I'm guessing your the fence." Antala replied.

"I am. Just call me 9 Lives for now." The woman told her. "So, where's the gold?"

"Um, about that..." Antala said. Then she explained what happened. At the end, she got out of the car and showed 9 Lives her gold-filled belly.

"Oh boy." 9 Lives finally said after Antala finished the story.

"So, what do we do? I have no idea how to get the gold out of here." Antala said, shaking her belly for emphasis. The gold rattled inside.

"How the hell should I know? This has never happened before. Let me call a friend." 9 Lives then pulled out a cell phone and dialed a number.
---------------------------
12 minutes later, 9 Lives hung up. She turned back to Antala.

"OK, that was a doctor I know. I told him what happened and he has an idea on how to extract the gold from yout gut. But it's going to take him a while to get what he needs." 9 Lives explained.

"How long?" Antala asked.

"Um, about..."
154111.title: 9 Lives

1541113.content:
"About 5 years." Antala grunted because she almost had a heart attack right then and there. "5 years?! Are you kidding me! I'm going to have a belly full of gold coins for 5 years!? What the heck." 9 Lives just stared at Antala. "This is the only way to get the gold out. Let me remind you that I'm not the idiot who swallowed all those gold coins. You'll just have to lay low for a while. I'll call you when the doctor gets everything he needs. Maybe if we're lucky he can see you earlier than expected." Antala crossed her arms as her belly filled with coins jiggled and shook. This was a rather revolting development indeed. Antala got back into her car and let out a groan as the coins shook inside of her.

"Terrific," mumbled the succubus sarcastically. "This is just terrific. I have to keep this belly out of sight from the police for 5 whole freaking years. Who knows how much could happen in 5 years. Antala then heard her stomach growling and moaned. "It's about time that I had some real food in my stomach. Maybe it will calm my nerves." Antala decided that it would be a good idea to look for a restaurant because at that moment, her stomach was growling and that caused the coins inside of her stomach to shake as she grunted. It was causing her great pain." Antala looked out the window to see several eateries. "Donut Shop Voracious? Not a good idea. I might run into those idiot cops again. José's? No way, they're running out of business. Mr. Smo...? oh good grief. I'd rather go to jail that run into that cretin again. It's been a whole year since it ended and he still hasn't changed his tune. Aha." Antala's stop for lunch was a Ramen shop.

However, in the back of the shop there was trouble brewing. The owner was a shady looking kappa resembling a snapping turtle with bright red skin and a spiked metal collar around his neck. He was looking at a strange golden penny. He was speaking with a mummy who was wearing a fedora and trenchcoat, the former had a centipede on it. “Are you certain that this Midas penny is exactly as you said it was.” The mummy nodded his head. “Positive. Just place it on your gold and it will multiply like nobody’s business.” The kappa glared at the mummy man. “How do I know you aren’t lying?” The mummy held up his head and revealed that his eye sockets were empty. “Do I look like a liar to you?” The kappa paid the mummy who handed him the penny. The mummy then mysteriously faded away. The kappa gave a grunt. “How ironic. I paid 300 for a penny. I hope it works. Then I can actually buy some adequate ingredients.”

  Suddenly, Antala rang the bell to call the kappa. “Excuse me?” asked Antala. “Could I get the house special.” “Coming right up!” The kappa in his haste, deposited the Midas penny inside of a bowl of ramen and without even thinking, he begun to prepare ramen in the same bowl. As the kappa ran to the main dining hall of restaurant, he had no idea that the magic penny was inside of it. As Antala received her ramen, she let out a year. “5 years with all this gold in my belly,” she said. “I’m gonna have to lay low. Oh, what am I worried about. They’ll call off the search by then and the gold is all mine.” But then, Antala gasped because outside, Bill and Bennett, the gargoyle cops from before were on patrol.” In the process, she accidentally swallowed the Midas Penny.

Antala was about to run but then the kappa stopped her. “Hey!” he yelled. “You’re not thinking of dining and dashing are you.”  Antala saw the cops outside and begun to sweat as she walked up to the kappa proprietor but then she grunted because she heard the sound of metal and held her stomach in pain as the coins in her body appeared to be multiplying. “What the?!” yelled the kappa proprietor. Antala screamed as her stomach was on the ground and bloated until it was...
1541113.title: 5 Years to Lose

15411131.content:
Antala's stomach was twice as big as before and was touching the ground. It appeared to be four times as wide as she was tall and pinned her down. She grunted as the kappa proprietor looked in surprise. Then he looked around the counter and noticed that the Midas Penny was missing. "Where is it!? I put the pen.." The kappa then gasped and realized that he had accidentally mixed in the Midas penny with Antala's ramen. Then he turned his head to see Antala lifting up her belly and then attempting to waddle away. "But wait," thought the kappa to himself. "The mummy said that stuff was supposed to work on gold. How is it possible that?"

Before the kappa could put 2 and 2 together, Bill and Bennett came in. "Excuse me, sir," said Bennett to the kappa man. "Have you seen any suspicious characters in this neighborhood." "Uh," muttered the kappa. "Suspicious characters." "We just got a report that somebody stole the legendary Midas Penny from the museum down the street from here." "Stole?" asked the kappa being very worried. Bill nodded his head. "Yes, and from what the witness described, the thief was a mummy with a centipede on the top of his fedora. Probably trying to fence the penny."

While the cops were distracted, Antala started to sneak towards the door. However, she was overhearing the conversation because she was certain that it might be important. "Tell me more about this alleged penny," said the kappa nervously. "The Midas penny." "Well," said Bennett. "Legend has it that this penny when it touches gold, causes it to multiple exponentially." Antala gasped and then started to squeeze her massive belly though the door, making absolutely sure not to make any noise from the shaking coins in her stomach in order to avoid the cops getting suspicious. "No, Officer," said the kappa just as Antala was stuck in the door and struggling to get out. "I've never seen anything of the sort. "Well," said Bill. "Keep an eye out. Whoever has that penny will be under arrest for possession of stolen property and counterfeiting."

Antala gasped and struggled right before she managed to squeeze her belly through the door, albeit damaging the wall in the process. Bill and Bennett heard the crashing sound and turned their heads to see the missing wall, but they didn't see Antala at all. Bennett got suspicious and walked out. Antala had at the moment hid behind the ramen house and was sweating right before the gargoyle cop took out his phone. "Thom," he said to the dispatcher. "Put out an APB. We've got a vandal on the loose as well as thieves. How would you like that. I thought crime would be low after Taxanos got the iron maiden."

Antala let out a groan and held up her belly. "Well," she said. "There's no way those gargoyles would believe I was pregnant with a gut this big." Antala had to wait for the cops to leave before she walked out of the alleyway and looked around and then waddled down the street as her belly was slowly getting bigger due to the magic penny in her stomach." Antala let out a groan. "Well," she said. "I better get out of the country. They'll never be able to follow me there. Hmm." Antala flapped her wings but they did nothing. She knew she had to get far away from town.

And so, while making absolutely sure the guards couldn't see her or her growing belly, she headed for the...
15411131.title: Get Out of Town

choices: The Police Arrive at the Station
154111312.content:
Antala thought her options over and then she realized that with her belly being so big, taking a plane was out of the question. All the gold in her stomach would only serve to weigh her down and she would take the plane with her. Besides, there was the whole issue with the metal detector and she'd be caught in no time. "Well," said the big gutted succubus with a heavy sigh. "It looks like I'm taking the train." Antala grunted and lifted up her large stomach as best as she could and then saw several people were walking down the street. Antala gulped because she realized all too well that there were too many witnesses in the area. She needed some way to hide her stomach. That was when she saw some old curtains and a damaged shopping cart and got an idea.

Antala placed her belly filled with gold into the shopping cart and covered it with some of the curtains while fastening the rest into a form of makeshift dress, making her resemble a bag lady. Antala slowly walked down the street, pushing the cart as she looked around, making absolutely sure that nobody spotted her. At one point, she stopped and sweated because the police car with the two gargoyles inside it passed her and the cops inside very nearly spotted her. Antala waited five minutes to see if the cops would return and to her luck, they most likely assumed that she was an ordinary bag lady. Antala let out a sigh of relief as she made her way towards the train station. "Thank goodness," she said. "This isn't easy."

Unfortunately, at that moment at the police station, the very moment where Antala was reaching the train station, one of the boys back at the station had contacted Bill and Bennett. The dispatcher was a short yellowish-green gargoyle with a bald held and long jagged wings. "You two might want to hear this. We've identified the gold smuggler." "Are you sure about that, Thom?" asked Bennett. Thom nodded his head and looked at a composite sketch. "Our main witness was an elderly wheelchair-bound cyclops who was painting in the area. He claims that smugly we're looking for is a succubus; 5' 10. 187lbs, red skin and silver hair with an hourglass shape." "That's funny. We saw a succubus who fit the description earlier, except she was pregnant." Thom thought hard on that but then he realized something.

"Or at least that's what she told you. My guess is that she converted the gold bars into coins and literally swallowed the evidence." Bennett nodded his head. "Oh, really? I think we need to have another talk with a certain demon." Bennett hung up as Bill turned the car around. "I can't believe it," said the red-skinned gargoyle. "You can't trust anybody these days. What is the world coming to?"

Meanwhile, Antala had reached the train station but saw that there was a metal detector posted outside of the train. "Blast!" yelled Antala. "Everyone is so on edge. That's the problem. Criminals in this city ruined everything for everyone." Antala needed a way on the train without being detected. That's when she spotted several caskets being loaded in one of the cars in the back. Antala remembered that there was an undertaker's convention in the next city over and had an idea. She sucked in her gut as best as she could when the porter wasn't looking and then she squeezed herself into the biggest coffin there was. She still grunted and groaned because it was very tight. The weight of the gold caused the two porters loading the coffin to almost drop it. It was a sheer miracle that Antala managed to get on the train at all. Antala gave a smirk, thinking she had once again escaped Johnny law.

It was then...

1541113122.content:
At that moment, Bill and Bennett had arrived at the train station and went through the turnstile. "Well," said Bennett. "That's a new one, Bill. Have you ever heard of anyone trying to hide gold away by swallowing it?" Bill snorted. "And my wife says that I have strange eating habits. And I actually thought that woman was pregnant. We'll fix her wagon." Antala opened the coffin slightly and gasped because she saw the police looking all over for her. She slammed the coffin shut and gulped. "Well," she said. "This is a fine kettle of fish. If those bozos find me in here, I'm done for. Perhaps I need to find a better hiding spot."

That's what Antala thought, but then she heard a rumbling and shaking sound and then she heard the sound of gold rustling. "Oh no," muttered the succubus. "Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Not now!" But it was too late because the gold in Antala's stomach multiplied again due to the Midas penny and now her belly had gotten so big that she was trapped inside the coffin and was unable to come out. "Ho no." Grunted Antala. Antala tried to struggle but it only succeeded in causing cracks to appear in the coffin.

All that time, Bill and Bennett were looking around. They had encountered another large-bellied succubus similar in body shape to Antala (before her not quite bright idea to swallow the gold that is) except with blonde hair and blue skin. Bennett had just finished looking around. "This one isn't her. She really is pregnant. Not to mention the wrong color. You're free to go, ma'am." Bill then tapped Bennett on the shoulder just as the other succubus left. “Hey, Bennett,” said the larger gargoyle. “Something just occurred to me. Maybe our perp is trying to get away on a train.” Bennett gave a scoff. “Well, duh, Bill. Of course. Are you’re saying that’s she’s already on her train by now?” Bill nodded his head. “It’s a possibility.

Before either gargoyle cop could do any more thinking on the matter, they both heard a loud crash. “Holy moley!” yelled Bill. “What was that.” The coffin that Antala was in had broken apart and Antala had to get up fast. She grunted as she held up her gold-filled stomach and entered the last car of the train she was on. “Oh,” said Bennett having heard the nose. “That’s it. That sound was definitely Antala. She’s on one of these trains. Let’s get her, Bill.” Antala heard every word and begun to panic. She was tapping her hooves on the floor as her stomach shook and she begun to sweat. “Oh,” muttered Antala. “This was definitely not my best idea. Why didn’t I try to leave by plane? Oh no, oh no, oh no.”
 

But is Antala in the right to be worried? Do Bill and Bennett get on her train?

1551.title: Fat

choices: The size of a yoga ball
15511.content:
"Thanks for letting me stay at your house, Yuki." Antala said as she removed her high-heeled boots before walking into said house and heading up to the guest room.

"Anything for my old friend." Yuki replied cheerfully as she head to her own bedroom.

Antala had decieded to take a month-long vacation in Japan. Needing a place to stay, she chose to call up her old friend Yuki to ask if she could stay at the house she haunted. Despite being a Onryo, a spirit born of rage, Yuki was happy to let her do so and to show her Japan's best sights. Today, just after Antala arrived via portal, Yuki had shown her the Tokyo Tower and had her try to climb Mt. Fuji (Antala ran out of energy half-way up). By the time they got back, it was night.

"How were you able to get to the top of Fuji and back without breaking a sweat? I gave up half-way and I'm an immortal succubus." Antala yelled to Yuki through the door as she changed into a black bra and panties.

"Being a ghost means I have infinite energy. No getting tired for me." Antala heard Yuki laugh. "I can't believe I found you sleeping on the ground when I got back to you. You looked so cute."

Antala chuckled herself. "Yeah, and you had to carry me back to the car."

"I know. You are one loud snorer." Yuki said as she opened the door to Antala's room, having already changed into her white nightgown.

Antala looked over at her. She had to admit, Yuki looked pretty. Yuki was only an inch taller than Antala. Her pitch black hair was loose and framed her chalk-white face. Though she had a similar figure to Antala's, she did have one difference: her belly was rather chunky, looking like an overinflated spare tire. Yuki said that she worked out enough to get her current shape, but Antala didn't know of any workout that gave that figure.

It took Antala a minute to realize that she was staring at Yuki's belly, and quickly looked away, blushing. Yuki giggled. "Well, gee, Antala. I didn't know you had a thing for bellies."

Though Antala didn't want to admit it, Yuki was right. Antala did love big, fat bellies. She even had a slight crush on Yuki mostly because of her belly.

"I don't." Antala lied. "It's just, your nightgown is tight enough that it's hard NOT to look at."

"Well, maybe during the night, the Nebutori well give you a belly just like mine." Yuki said.

Antala looked at Yuki like she just spoke in some dead tounge even Antala didn't know. "The Nebu-what?"

"Nebutori. It's a supernatural virus. It only affects women. During the night, it makes them become really fat and lethargic. Though it can target specific spots sometimes. I knew a kappa who got infected. By the time she was cured, her butt was the size of a truck. Took her a month to slim down."

Antala just stared at Yuki for a moment. "Ok, you need sleep. Go to bed."

Yuki shrugged. "Alright, see you in the morning." She said and went back to her room.

Antala shut the door and flopped down on the bed, going to sleep instantly.

During the night, a small blue orb appeared in Antala's bedroom. It went over to Antala, seemed to look at her for a moment, and sent a soft light to her belly. It then vanished, leaving a blue glow on Antala's belly.

In the morning, Antala woke up, ready to really begin her vacation. But when she tried to get up, she felt a weight on her stomach. Throwing off the covers, she looked down at her belly. To her shock she saw that it was...
15511.title: Infected

155111.content:
Antala's belly was only about as big as a basketball and it was wiggling as Antala held onto it and gasped. "What in the world?" she asked. Yuki flew in carrying breakfast when she spotted Antala. "Good morning, Antala," said Yuki. "I hope you're hungry, I.... oh my gosh!" Yuki dropped her dishes and looked in surprise as Antala held up her slightly larger belly. "Yuki?" asked Antala. "What is going on?" Yuki gave a laugh and tapped Antala's stomach, much to her western friend's discomfort. "It looks like you have nebutori, Antala. Just look at that belly. Okay, so the size isn't that impressive but it's still something." Yuki gave a giggle and held out her own belly.

Antala however, was not feeling as excited about this situation. While she did have a thing for large bellies, she didn't mean that she felt comfortable with one on herself. Antala tried to push in her stomach, causing Yuki to have a fit. "Wait!" yelled Yuki as she tried to stop Antala. "Stop! What are you doing!? This is nothing to be ashamed of." Antala let out a sigh. "That's easy for you to say, Yuki. People where I'm from are rather critical of fat." Then Antala realized something and looked at herself in the mirror. While it was true that her belly was slightly bigger, the rest of her body was completely untouched.

"Yuki," says Antala. "I don't mean to pry, but isn't nebutori supposed to make women really large and lethargic? So far, it's only centered in my stomach." Yuki remembered that and then rubber her chin and then her own stomach. "Well," she says. "Nebutori affects all victims differently. I knew of a gargoyle who looked like a dead ringer for that blue one in the cartoon. She came to Japan on vacation and was infected. Instead of focusing on a particular area, it made her spherical and she kept falling and rolling down hills." Yuki let out a laugh remembering that particular instance. "Or then there was another tourist who was friends with that gargoyle. A human woman whose nebutori literally went to her head and it took her weeks to recover." Antala shivered thinking of such a horrifying experience.

"Those poor women." Antala was so stressed out that she was pacing in circles and tapping her hooves. As she did so, Yuki looked on and blinked. She had to rub her eyes and the Onryo's jaw dropped because at one point, Antala started to jog. "Antala," she says. "Haven't you noticed that you're acting usually active for somebody who's supposed to have nebutori." Antala stopped in her tracks and her eyes popped out of her head. She tapped her stomach and it made a noise like a basketball. "You're right. Nebutori makes women lethargic. How come it didn't affect me. Hey, wait a minute! Do you know of any other succubi who were infected with nebutori?"

Yuki actually had to think long and hard about that, but then she realized something. Not a lot of succubi actually come around here. Come to think of it, nebutori doesn't often infect western monsters. Maybe some certain people in the west have a natural immunity to certain aspects of nebutori. That's amazing. You can do what other girls without nebutori can do." Antala blinked. "That's... that's..." Antala was of mixed thoughts. She was overjoyed that the nebutori didn't make her lethargic like most of the other victims of nebutori. She did have a thing for big bellies but she was still having second thoughts about having one herself and bit her lip.

Antala did her best in order to forget what was bothering her, but she realized very quickly that none of the clothes she brought with her could fit over her large stomach. The Doctor Who shirt she had with her, that was one of her favorite shirts, only covered her belly halfway. Antala let out a groan but then Yuki tapped her on the stomach and handed her another t-shirt that was bigger and would've fit much better. It had bright colored Japanese letters on it and some kind of anime graphic. Antala smiled and took the t-shirt and found it fit her much better. "Thank you, Yuki." Said Antala. Yuki smiled and nodded her head at her succubus friend. "Anytime. Anything for a friend."

Antala was about to walk out but then looked at her stomach. "I don't know if I should be going out like this, Yuki. What if somebody sees me like this?" Yuki gave a scoff. "I happen to know some girls with past experiences with nebutori. They'll understand. Besides, what should you care what others think of you. The important thing is to have confidence. Just because your belly is bigger, doesn't mean you should be ashamed. After all, I thought you liked them like that." Antala smiled and then nodded her head. "You're right, Yuki. Let's go."

It took some effort for Antala to get through the door, but she walks out and is rather confident with herself as Yuki follows her. Where are the two friends on their way to, in the big city?
155111.title: Antala the Basketball

155112.content:
Overnight, Antala's belly had blown up to the size of Yuki's belly, which was about the size of a beach ball, but unlike Yuki's, it was a perfect sphere. Antala placed her hands on it to make sure it was real. She confirmed it when her hands sank into her belly. Antala had to get a second witness to this.

"Hey Yuki. You up yet?" Antala yelled.

"Yes. Why?" Yuki replied through the walls.

"You may want to come in here." Antala called out.

"Sure. Give me a sec."

Sure enough, a few seconds later, Yuki walked into the guest room.

"Ok, what's-" Yuki began to say, before seeing Antala's bloated belly. Her jaw dropped.

"Woah." Yuki said.

"Yeah. I just woke up and found this." Antala replied, motioning to her belly.

"Guess I was right. The nebutori did visit you. And it looks like it's one of those specific spot ones." Yuki said, walking over to the bed. "It's as big as my belly." On that, she placed her hands on Antala's belly.

This action made Antala blush a shade of orange. She felt Yuki poke, rub, and squish her new belly.

"It's so soft." Yuki said. "This is amazing!"

"Great, but can you please stop touching it?" Antala said.

"Sorry." Yuki replied, pulling her hands away. "I couldn't resist."

"Right." Antala said, annoyed. "So, is there a cure for this?"

"There is, but it takes a while to make. But there is no way we are curing this!"

"WHAT?! WHY?! Wait, don't tell me. You just 'happen' to have a thing for fat bellies too?" Antala asked.

Yuki sheepishly grinned. "Yeah. Why do you think I go out of my to keep my belly?"

"Of course. Should have guessed."

"Wait, 'too'? I was right, you do have a thing for fat bellies. I knew it! I knew it!" Yuki yelled, happy at being right.

"Yay. Good for you." Antala replied sarcastically. 'This is feeling like one of those expansion stories Kada loves reading so much.' She said under her breath.

"Come on." Yuki said before pulling Antala up.

"What are you doing?" Antala asked, trying to get used to standing with her new belly.

"I'm going to take you out, so you can show off that gorgeous gut of your's. So get changed, but make sure your belly stays uncovered." Yuki said happily.

155112.title: Matching Bellies (kind of)

1551122.content:
"The what?" Antala asked.

"Oh, right. You don't speak much Japanese. It means "Sexy Belly". It's a woman's only club. As the name states, it's all about big bellies. It doesn't matter what their filled with, just as long as they are big. The bigger, the better. So get changed. I'm taking you clubbing!" Yuki said, before starting for her room.

"Yuki, it's 11 in the morning! Can it wait?" Antala asked.

Yuki looked back and blushed. "Oh, right. My bad. Got a little excited." She said. "You want breakfast or lunch?"
----------------------
The day went by uneventfully, oddly enough. Antala and Yuki mostly spent the day inside, either watching cheesy horror movies or playing games. At around 6, Yuki told Antala to change into something to wear to SekushῙ Hara.

After about 30 minutes, Antala changed into a skimpy black dress and her high-heeled boots. She stood at the front door waiting for Yuki. Eventually, Yuki came down. She was wearing a dark orange tank top, tight black pants, and red high heels. Her belly was completely exposed. When she saw Antala, she frowned.

"You're wearing that?" Yuki asked.

"What's wrong with it?" Antala asked back.

"You're new belly's not out for everyone to see." Yuki replied. "Is this your favorite dress?"

"No, I have 7 more back home. Why?" Antala asked.

Yuki simply walked to the bathroom and grabbed a pair of scissors. When she came back, she told Antala to remove the dress. Antala did, and Yuki started cutting. When she was done, she gave the dress back. Antala put it back on, and saw that Yuki had cut the dress in a way that Antala's belly was out in the open.

"Much better! Ready to go?" Yuki asked.

Antala shrugged. "I guess." She replied.

Yuki then grabbed Antala's arm and took her out the door.
---------------
An hour later, Yuki and Antala were standing outside the club. Antala had to admit, it looked decent from the outside. A simple neon sign with the name and a bright blue color.

"Do we need a secret password or be members or something like that to get it?" Antala asked.

"Nope. It's a fairly open club. The only real rule is you need to be over 18. You're 24 in human years and I was 25 when I died, which was 20 years ago, so we're good." Yuki said.

Before Antala could say anything, Yuki dragged her into the club. After a brief check with the bouncer, they were in.

Antala was amazed. The outside did not properly advertise the inside. Inside was incredible. There were two well stocked bars, a very open floor, bright cheery lighting, and wonderful music. The club was filled with female monsters of all species, all with varying belly sizes. But Antala's eyes were drawn to the stage. On it were 8 of the most beautiful women dancing in skimpy clothing. All of them had truly massive bellies, easily twice the size of her's and Yuki's.

"So Antala," Yuki yelled over the music. "What do you want to do first?"

Antala thought. "I want..."

“Achoo!” Antala sneezed. The young succubus wiped frozen snot from her nose and shivered as she curled her wings up and started to form a large wall of ice. Bumps appeared all over her back and chin as her thin pointed succubus tail morphed into a large and finned whale's tail. Her skin turned a turquoise shade of green as her wings expanded to accommodate her bigger belly that was now as big as a baby whale. Antala's hooves turned into fins as webs grew between her fingers and she then let out a bellow like a humpback whale. Antala looked at her reflection in the walls of her igloo and was horrified at what she saw.
