Stop! Look out!" Antala had crashed into Kai and knocked them both to the ground, destroying a coffee pot against the wall in the process. "Oops," said Antala as she stood up. "I am really sorry, Kai." Kai yelled in pain as hot coffee had got into his eyes and as he stood up, he moaned. "Antala?" growled Kai. "Why in the name of all that's good are you wearing roller skates." Antala stood up and blushed. "I'm really sorry, Kai." She said. "I just figured that by wearing these skates I'd be able to move about quicker and get to the tables better." Kai rolled his now, bright red eyes.

"Who do you think you are? That doctor with the mustache? Listen, Antala, please be careful. These people are expecting food and a lot of them have really hot tempers. Don't do anything that would upset them." Antala let out a nervous laugh as Kai handed her a tray of pasta. "Don't worry, Kai. I'll be careful." However, Kai let out a groan. "I wish that I could believe that. Just don't try anything stupid, Antala." Antala nodded her head and skated on her way. "Oh!" yelled Kai. "Bring that to table 23!" "I got it!"

At table 23, there was a man wrapped from head to toe in black robes. It was unknown if he was a human or some sort of monster but he had glowing red eyes and dark gray-skin. He was hissing as eh was tapping his fingers on the table. He was holding onto an idol of some sort that resembled Ammut, the devourer of the dead. "Where is my pasta?" asked the man. "What is with this restaurant?" "Coming!" yelled Antala as she was skating. Antala was nervously making her way up towards the mysterious man in black and gulped. She had almost made it when suddenly, her roller skates lost their wheels and she let out a yell as she fell towards the man.

Antala spilled spaghetti all over the man and made him scream. In the process, he dropped the idol on the ground and it shattered. "No! You stupid fool, look what you've done!" Antala saw the pieces on the ground and gasped. "Oh no. Oh no. I'm really sorry! Please don't tell Kai!" But the man stood up and growled. He placed his finger on Antala's forehead and chanted strange words. On her back appeared a tattoo of a hippo. Antala stood up and groaned before she heard Kai calling her. "Antala! Come here, please!" "Coming!"

As Antala was walking away, she failed to notice that not only was her face contorting, but her belly was slowly and slowly getting bigger. Her skin was changing color to a rather...
1551321.title: Living in the Nile

15513211.content:
Antala's skin was turning a metallic pink hue as the hippo tattoo on her back was glowing bright. The tattoo appeared to have glowing eyes. Antala's belly grew bigger and more protruding with each step. However, that wasn't the only part that was changing. Her skin was becoming thicker, almost like it was the skin of some kind of pachyderm. Her ears were becoming low but pointed at the same time, like those of some kind of heavy hoover land mammal. Antala's eyes were still bright yellow, but her silver hair was getting smaller until it turned into an Egyptian-style bob cut and her pointed tail had shrunk until it was small and stubby. Her face had extended into a large snout and as Antala paused to yawn, her teeth turned into large fangs and tusks that were bright yellow in color as there appeared to be some strange void in the back of her mouth.

Antala had completely turned into a strange creature that resembled a large cross between a succubus and a hippopotamus. Everyone stopped and stared at her and one young man even walked into her belly and fell down. As Antala was walking, she was bumping into tables and her big belly was knocking everything over and causing plates and cups to crash. Antala looked around and saw the damage, somehow failing to notice her own transformation and blushed, causing her metallic pink skin to briefly turn to its original red tint. "Sorry," said Antala. "I'm sorry. Oh. I'm so very sorry. Oh no!" Antala's belly had managed to knock over another succubus waitress and made her spill coffee into a customer's lap as the customer yelled in pain.

Kai heard the commotion and gave a growl. "What the heck is going on out there?" asked the crocodile man to himself. "It sounds like a minotaur in a China shop. Oh, if Antala has destroyed the cafe, that's it! Pink slip city! No excuses! Antala! What's going on out... here?!" Antala was biting her lip nervously and shivering as her boss looked on at her. However, his fury quickly turned to concern when he found out about what happened to his waitress.

"Antala?" asked Kai. Antala bowed down, accidentally breaking the floor with her belly. "I'm really sorry about the damages, Kai! Dock my pay! Give me more work! Just, please don't fire me!" Kai bit his lip and looked at Antala. "Uh," he said. "Antala. It looks like you have more serious problems to worry about than your job." Kai held up a piece of broken glass and Antala looked in surprise at the fact she was now a hippopotamus with a large protruding gut. Her jaw dropped and she walked forward, accidentally knocking Kai over with her stomach that appeared to still be getting bigger.

Exactly how does Antala take this?
15513211.title: The Pink Hippo

1552.content:
Jelly!

Option 1 - Jupiter Jelly - In this story, Antala is forced to work at a donut shop to pay off damages done to the shop's delivery truck. Predictably, Antala hates the situation but when she samples the Jupiter Jelly used for the filling of the jelly donuts, she quickly becomes addictive. However, the jelly in question was not meant to be consumed by a succubus as it has strange effects.

Option 2 - Royal Jelly - In this story, Antala learns about how future queen bees are fed royal jelly. Antala in this story is running for mayor of a village of monsters and is having trouble winning the public over. So she gets the hair-brained idea of consuming as much royal jelly as possible in order to make herself charismatic enough to get an edge up in the polls. Whether or not her scheme works (which isn't likely), she certainly will be queen-sized.
1552.title: Jelly Options

15521.content:
Our story begins in the monster-filled town of Bagel Heights when Antala was driving down the street and then her cell phone started to ring loudly as she received a text from a friend and decided to check it out, forgetting that at the time she was driving. She was so busy that she didn’t notice that down the street there was a van that was coming to a stop. The Van had an image of a white hole on the side of it, surrounding a galaxy.

In the front of the car was a couple of male monsters, both of which were cyclopses. First there was an older cyclops with red-orange-skin and no hair who was wearing an apron like a cook. The other cyclops was significantly younger and had pink-skin and freckles and was wearing a cap on his head. From the looks of it, they were coming back from city hall.

“What a stroke of luck that the Mayor signed the seal of approval for us to put up the White Hole in Bagel Heights.” “I wouldn’t celebrate just yet, Corey,” said the older cyclops. “We still have to be ready. I’m expecting a shipment of Jupiter Jelly. It’s made from a newly discovered plant that grew where a meteor landed. It appears to be safe for consumption. I think it will be very popular.” “I should hope so, Uncle Ivan,” said Corey. “Especially after what happened back in Strawberry Valley.” “That was unfortunate,” said Ivan. “But they finally caught him before he could do some real damage.”

The cyclopses’ car came to a stop sign and Corey stopped his vehicle. However, Antala was still texting in her own car right before she noticed Corey’s car. She gasped and tried to turn on the brakes but was too late and rear-ended Corey’s car, spooking the young cyclops who switched the car to park as Ivan clutched his chest. “Great Zeus!” yelled the older cyclops. “What was that?!” Corey immediately got out and yelled as he spotted the damage done to his car and then spotted Antala’s car. “Uh-oh.” Muttered Antala.

Needless to say, Corey was triggered and angrily tapped on Antala’s car window. “Come on out of there you jerk!” Antala stepped out in embarrassment as Ivan came out of the passenger seat of Corey’s car to see the commotion. Corey saw Antala’s cell phone in her hand and was even madder than he was a second ago. “You idiot! Don’t you know that texting and driving can get people killed!?” “I’m sorry,” muttered Antala. “I wasn’t...” “You weren’t thinking!” yelled Corey. “Look what your stupidity did to my car! I demand restitution.”

Antala took out her wallet but there was nothing inside of it but her driver’s license. “I’m really sorry, sir. I’m tapped out at the moment.” Corey was about to erupt again but Ivan intervened. “Corey, calm down. I’ll pay for the damages. As for you, young girl. I think I know of a way for you to reimburse us and make up for it. It just so happens that we have an opening at the White Hole for new employees." Ivan took out a cap and uniform and handed it to Antala as she let out a groan.

At that moment at the White Hole, the delivery truck came before Corey and Ivan could even reach their donut shop and a large burly minotaur with an eyepatch dropped off a package containing jars filled with a strange glowing jelly of some sort.

- - - - - - -

Now we skip to Antala starting her first shift on...
15521.title: Jupiter Jelly and the White Hole

1553.content: This is where we start getting into the more interesting choices. Enjoy.
1553.title: More Options, please

15531.content:
Here's one option. I said I was going to add to this story and I'm a man of my word. I'll continue this one later, but you can use your own ideas.

Lady of the Lighthouse - Antala is starting her first day as the lighthouse keeper in a sea for monsters, but has the extreme misfortune of starting her day in the middle of a storm. To make matters worse, through a weird accident, she accidentally swallows the bulb for the lighthouse and for some reason the light won't turn off, instead, causing Antala to swell into one big bulb.

I'll be back to continue this one later.
15531.title: Light

155311.content:
It was a dark and stormy night (cliched beginning, I know, but roll with it, please). In a part of the world where only monsters lived, there was a lonely island on the ocean consisting of nothing but a lighthouse that shined a bright blue light among a sea that was bright red with pink clouds billowing through the sky and spewing lightning so powerful that it caused rocks to shatter. Swimming through the water was a rather gigantic and obese mermaid who resembled a dugong in body shape but with bright pink hair and a tattoo of a triangle on her face. The mermaid was chewing on a suspicious looking bone as she looked up at the night.

“Goodness sakes,” said the mermaid as she rubbed her enormous belly. “This storm is the worst we’ve had in years. I hope that Antala is doing okay. If memory serves, she’s starting her job as lighthouse keeper tonight.”  Approaching the lighthouse was a rowboat that was 1/10th of the enormous mermaid’s size. The mermaid ducked underwater as the rowboat was approaching the lighthouse. Aboard this boat was a bright red-skinned and silver haired succubus with a voluptuous hourglass shape, gold cat-like eyes, sharp teeth and huge bat wings.

Her name was Antala and she was beginning her first night as lighthouse keeper. There was a bayside town of monsters in the area and they relied on the goods that were shipped from overseas. However, Antala was very nervous. She couldn’t handle the responsibility, especially because practically every night in the area was a stromy night. This night in particular was even stormier than usual. As Antala sailed towards the lighthouse, fish that were even bigger than the titanic mermaid she passed, swam under her and Antala screamed as one large spike-covered tentacle reached out of the water.

“Why did I sign up for this job?” asked Antala to herself. “The last lighthouse keeper has been missing for 6 months. He’s probably in the belly of a mermaid by now. The reason he went missing was because of that burning waterspout. How does water even catch on fire? Now, calm down, Antala. Maybe it won’t be...” Antala’s sentence was cut off by the sound of lightning that struck the water and caused a burned up squid to rise from the water as it coughed up several fish with human-like teeth into the succubus’s rowboat. Antala gulped and then she reached the island where the lighthouse was. As soon as she reached the lighthouse and stepped off of her rowboat, the boat dissolved and broke apart, causing Antala to turn around in fear.

Antala shivered. “The town had better pay me a fortune for this.”   Antala ran into the lighthouse and then she saw the light was already on. “That’s strange,” she said. “Maybe the lightning kicked it on.” Antala walked forward but then the light started to flicker on and off. “What?!” yelled Antala. “No!” Antala flew to the beacon and pounded on the light until the bulb popped out. Antala screamed and grabbed the bulb so it wouldn’t break on the ground. The succubus let out a sigh of relief. But her relief was short-lived because at that moment, a large branch flew through the window and struck Antala. In the process, Antala’s grip on the bulb slipped and it fell into her mouth. The succubus gagged on the bulb and then accidentally swallowed it. “Oh no!” Antala screamed and fell to the floor.

The young succubus got up and let out a moan. She then let out a hic. “Oh no,” she said. “I swallowed the bulb. This is...” Suddenly, Antala’s belly glowed blue and started to expand. Antala grunted and then flew back to the beacon as her belly rumbled and swelled. In 30 seconds, Antala’s stomach was twice as big as she was tall and glowing bright blue. “That’s... never happened before.” Said Antala. As Antala was trying to figure out what happened, she heard a strange noise. The succubus flew to the window, her belly glowing bright as she saw the ship that was coming into the bay. It was....
155311.title: Lady of the Lighthouse

choices: She Was Trapped in the Lighthouse Window
1553112.content:
The ship that was coming into port was a cargo ship. It was an enormous ship that resembled a cross between a submarine and a Japanese junk, a type of ship used during the Edo period. The ship had several marks at the sides as if it had been facing rough seas. The cargo was all tied down and there was one piece of cargo that appeared to have been bolted down and was covered by the tarp. The crew were trying their best to navigate the cargo ship through the harsh storm. The lightning came down swiftly and echoed through the air right before several hail stones the size and shape of whales came down and one of them even fell and broke the anchor off of the ship, causing one of the sailors aboard to scream.

It was at that moment, the ship's captain came out. The captain of the ship was a grayish yellow-skinned Cthulu-like creature with spider-like tendrils for hands, five eyes (one of which was covered by an eyepatch) and large wings attached under his arms. "We have our heading, men! We can't give up now!" The captain looked up and spotted the light emitting from Antala's enormous belly. "There's the light," said the captain. "That's odd, it looks larger than I recall. Not that that's necessarily a bad thing." Another member of the crew, an obese kappa woman with a red shell resembling a matamata walked up to the captain, clearly the first mate. "Weren't we going to stop at the lighthouse first?" asked the kappa. The captain nodded his head and then he opened up the tarp revealing that underneath, there was a large canister that seemed to contain a large and glowing aurora from the frigid North. "They're running low on bulbs," said the captain. "But this aurora we managed to collect from the North is guaranteed to shine for 100 years."

In the lighthouse, Antala was grunting and sweating as she attempted to hold up her enormous belly that was now so big it was poking out the lighthouse window and in the middle of the rain. "How did this happen?" asked Antala. "I didn't think that light would expand inside of me. I'm going to have to wait until the sun comes out and then fly back into town to see a doctor about this. Whoa!" A bolt of lightning came down and blew one of the rocks around the lighthouse into bits. On the ship on the ocean, one of the sailors, a male cyclops with a mechanical right leg and an arm ending in a metallic claw, looked up and noticed the storm.

"It's getting worse, Captain!" "Turn the ship to starboard! I know a grotto to pass into town safely. We'll have to wait until the storm clears to head for the lighthouse." Unfortunately for the crew, nature doesn't always follow the plans of men or beasts and a large chunk of whale-shaped hail fell and landed on the tube containing the aurora, causing the glass to violently shatter and for the aurora to come out. The crew covered their eyes to shield themselves from the burst of light. The light flew up into the air and towards the lighthouse.

"What's going on out there?!" yelled Antala. "Augh!" The aurora forced itself down Antala's throat and as it went down, her belly begun to glow both with the blue light from the lighthouse bulb and with the colors of the aurora that Antala had swallowed. Antala grunted and sweated and even panted as her stomach swelled up again and got so big that....
1553112.title: The Girl Behind the Aurora

15532.content:
So, how do the more dangerous of the elements on the periodic table end up in Antala's belly?

One Half-Life to Live - In this story, Antala is a 007-esque spy who is trying to stop a villain from taking over the world. However, in the process, the villain manages to trick Antala into consuming huge amounts of radioactive materials, not only giving her an enormous belly, but also turning her into a walking reactor. Now, every villain is after her, trying to either get the material out of her or trying to turn her into a nuclear battery. How will Antala get out of this one?

The Amazing Adventures of Radia - In this story, Antala is on Earth trying to steal the soul of a nuclear scientist. But during the process, she ends falling into a nuclear core. Instead of killing her, the radiation gives her amazing powers (her only powers previously were immortality and the ability to take souls). Antala quickly decides to become the nuclear superheroine Radia, but learns that her powers come at a cost: in order to keep them in peak condition, she must consume huge amounts of radiation, leaving her with an gigantic belly.
15532.title: Radiation

choices: Let's keep this gravy train rolling
15533.content:
OK, this is where my changed rule on Pregnancy comes into play. Remember, no birth, and she can only get pregnant via magical or scientific means. And, since this is pregnancy, slight breast and butt expansion will happen, just don't go overboard.

Also hot sauce. Why hot sauce? Why not hot sauce?
15533.title: Gimme more

155331.content:
So, how is Antala going to become the world's first permanently pregnant Succubus?

Gem of 100 Souls - In this story, Antala is hiking through a Brazilian rainforest when she comes across an odd garnet gem. Upon touching the gem, it immediately fuses itself to her stomach. She later learns what the gem is: it contains the souls of 100 deceased succubi, and the gem has made Antala heavily pregnant with all 100 of them. And worse, she can't give birth to them. What is Antala going to do?

Curse of the Succubus - In this story, Antala unintentional steals the soul of a person that another succubus was supposed to take. The other succubus becomes angry and places a curse on Antala, making her pregnant with all the souls she's taking in her life times 10. And since Antala stole 40 souls, that's means she now is pregnant with 400 souls. And the curse makes it so Antala can never give birth to them.
155331.title: Pregnancy

1553312.content:
Usually in the world of the succubus, the inhabitants respected one another when it was time to steal a soul. Unfortunately, there were times when one of two things would happen: either a succubus gets greedy and starts taking other succubi's jobs, or a succubus doesn't realize that the soul was already going to be taken by another.

"HOW COULD YOU?!"

This was one of the latter times.

"I'm sorry. I had no idea you were already after him!"

The two succubi arguing were Antala and Shansa. Both had similar body shapes, but Antala had silver hair, gold eyes, and was 5'10'' with bat wings, horns, and a tail. In contrast, Shansa had blue hair, black eyes, and was 6'1'' without the features Antala had. The two were arguing over the soul of a businessman. Antala had taken the soul while the man was sleeping, but Shansa was already supposed to take it. So when she found out what Antala did, she was not happy. And Shansa was know for being angry all the time.

"YOU SHOULD HAVE KNOWN! IT WAS POSTED ON THE SOUL BOARD!" Shansa screamed.

"I overslept. All I knew was this man was losing his soul, but I didn't have time to see the board. I didn't know." Antala replied, really fearing for her life.

Another thing Shansa was know for was cursing any succubus who pissed her off. One succubus accidentally spilled coffee on Shansa's chest, and Shansa cursed the woman with breasts the size of trucks. It took a month for the curse to wear off. Antala was worried about what would happen to her.

Shansa looked at Antala, then at the soul she was holding, and got a wicked idea. "Well, since you want souls so much, I've got the perfect curse for you. Do you like pregnancy?" She asked.

Antala gulped. "Uh, I guess?"

"Well guess what? Now you can experience it yourself. You're going to get really pregnant. With all the souls you've already taken. TIMES TEN! And the best part, you're never going to give birth to them. EVER!" And on that last yell, Shansa fired a beam at Antala's stomach, and then disappeared.

Antala stood there for a moment, frightened. After regaining her sense, she teleported back to her home world. After giving the soul to a nearby worker to drop off, she went back home, entered her room, and sat on the bed.

Antala stared at the ceiling, still shook up. She had just been cursed by Shansa. She was going to be pregnant with all the souls she took, multiplied by ten. That meant she was going to be carrying 400 souls! She was going to be enormous. And Shansa said she wouldn't give birth. Antala was freaking out. Not only was she going to be enormous, but she would be that way for the rest of her immortal life. Thankfully, she wasn't showing yet, so maybe the curse was slow acting. She hoped that would give her time to find a way to break it.

As she laid there, thinking, she started to get drowsy and, eventually, went to sleep. As she slept through the day and night, she didn't feel the warmth in her as her belly began to grow and grow fast.

The next day, Antala woke up, and mentally planned her day. She was going to head to the library to see if she can get rid of the curse. She tried to get up, but felt a weight pin her down. Antala was now scared. That could only mean one thing: she had already grown. She looked down to confirm her suspicion. She was right. She looked like she was...
1553312.title: Curse of the Succubus

15533122.content:
Well, when Shansa said she'd be pregnant, she meant it.

Antala was staring at a big pregnant belly. It looked like she was 9 months pregnant with one. Her belly button had also popped out. To her annoyance, her breasts had grown slightly too.

'Side effect of the curse.' Antala thought.

Slowly, Antala swung her body to the side and sat up. Even more slowly, she managed to get on her feet. She groaned, putting one hand on her back and the other under her belly.

'Geez, I'm going to be huge.' Antala thought.

Antala waddled (great, I have a waddle, she thought) over to her closet and opened it. She looked to see what would fit her. Eventually, she decided on a tank top and shorts. Unfortunately, after a great deal of effort to put both on, her belly was still exposed. She sighed and waddled out the bedroom door.

'This is going to be a long day.' She thought.
---------------------
A litle while later, Antala was waddling down the street. The other succubi looked at her sadly, since they had heard Shansa cursed her. Antala just sighed. Looking ahead, she saw the library. She was going to find a way to undo this. She waddled up to the steps, but before she could enter...
15533122.title: 9 Months in 1 Night

1553313.content: The Unique Summoner - In this story, Antala is given a Succubus promotion and chooses to become a Mother Summoner, who are highly respected and loved. She immediately becomes very popular and loved. However, due to a mistake made during her hiring, she is completely unable to give birth, leaving her permanently pregnant. Interestingly, this only makes her MORE popular.
1553313.title: More Pregnancy Options

15533131.content:
Antala waited nervously in the waiting room of the Grand Hall. She had been summoned here by the Queen for something important, but she didn't know what. She just hoped she wasn't in trouble.

Just then, two fairly muscular Guradian succubi walked in and motioned for her. She got up and followed them out of the waiting room and entered the Grand Hall proper. She was still nervous. Eventually, the two Guardians led her into the Queen's chamber. Oddly for a Queen, it was rather plain, with no extravagant decorations. The only notable thing was the throne, and on it was the Succubus Queen, Dazana.

Dazana was about 8 feet tall, had red hair, green eyes, and like most Queen's, silver skin. Like the Guardians, she was muscular, looking like a professional body-builder. She had horns and a tail, but no wings. She was wearing a black one-piece swimsuit.

Danaza looked and saw Antala. When she did, she broke out into a huge grin and ran up to her, putting her in a powerful bear hug.

"Antala! Long time no see!" She said.

Before becoming queen, Danaza was Antala's roommate. She was known for being way too affectionate, hugging everyone she met. And with her muscles, her hugs hurt.

"Good- urk!- to see you -ack! - too. You're - ow!- breaking my spine!" Antala managed to say.

"Oh, sorry." Danaza said, letting Antala go. "So you're probably wondering why you are here."

"I am." Antala said, while trying to realign her spine.

"Well, I've been looking over your performance, and I'm happy to say you've done well enough for a promotion!" Danaza said happily.

Antala squeeled in joy. "Really?!"

"Yup. And best part, you get to pick your new position!" Danaza beemed. "So, what do you-"

"Mother Summoner!" Antala cried out before Danaza could finish.

Summoners were responsable for bringing in new succubi. There were two kinds: Change Summoners, who brought new succubi in through magic, and Mother Summoners, who do the same, but with pregnancy.

Mother Summoners were treated like celebrites. They always got benifits, and everyone adored them. And since succubi can choose their pregnancy length, they can be popular for a long time.

Danaza grinned. "Not a problem. Guardians, bring the Mother Drink!"

A Guardian came in and brought a cup with a green liquid in it. "Drink this," Danaza said, "And you'll instantly become pregnant! Just think of how many kids you want, and drink."

Antala thought for a moment. She then smiled. "I want to be pregnant with..."
15533131.title: The Unique Summoner

15533132.content: The Permanent Mother-to-be - In this story, Antala is already pregnant- despite being a Soul Taker, and is rapidly approaching her due date. However, a curse intended for another succubus is placed on her by mistake, advancing her pregnancy to the end, but leaving her unable to give birth. Despite this, she can add more children inside her, making her even more pregnant than she already is
15533132.title: Another option

155332.content:
Okay, here's my option for the hot sauce path.

The Pernicious Pepper- In this story, Antala is trying to create a super spicy chili for a cook off, but is stumped. She goes to a pepper patch in order to find the perfect pepper for her chili and comes across a blue pepper that glows like a sun and is just as hot. In order to determine the spiciness of the pepper, Antala adds it to her chili and taste tests the sauce. However, the heat from the pepper alone creates an almost literal fire in her belly that never goes out and gets bigger when combined with more sauce made from that insidious pepper.

So how about it?
155332.title: Hot Sauce

choices: Yes. It was the Only One
No. There Were Others of Its Kind
1553321.content:
It was a dark night over Louisiana, in a dark part of the Bayou where only monsters lived and no humans ever dared to go. In a shack on the lake infested by zombified alligators, Antala the succubus was busy trying to brew together a super spicy chili recipe. The young succubus was already in her apron and had tossed in some curry powder, crab apples and even an entire herring skeleton. The chili bubbled and turned purple. "Hmm," said Antala. "Not quite right." Antala wiggled her behind and her pointed tail as she made her way up to the spice rack and started to take down every form of spice in sight.

The fact was that there was a chili cook off the next day and Antala had entered it. However, Antala was somewhat of a perfectionist. She was determined to win first place if she had to spice her chili with the soil from a grave. She did just that the very morning but that still wasn't enough to satisfy her hot sauce. "Needs a few more jumping beans and perhaps some dragon berries." As Antala threw in those ingredients, the curry begun to smoke. Antala then sprinkled in some oregano, curry powder, garlic and everything else she found in the spice rack. With some spices, she didn't even bother to take them out of the bottles and the glass melted in the curry mess before the curry spewed out some sparks.

Antala adjusted her glasses and then took a closer look into the curry to see fish bones crumbling to dust inside and screaming faces forming in the slop. Antala scratched the top of her head with her tail because there was something that was still bothering her about all the curry. "There's still something missing," said the succubus as she stomped her hoof. "I wish I knew what it is. What I need is to get more peppers." Antala left her shack, only to be attacked by a zombie alligator. Fortunately, Antala threw it back into the bayou and watched it sink to the bottom. "Annoying things," muttered Antala. "If they weren't an illegal ingredient, I would use them." Antala waddled through the murky water, carefully stepping over poisonous snakes as she made her way to a pepper patch.

The patch had ghost peppers with literal ghost faces as far as the eye could see and Antala was picking them one by one. The ones that were oddly shaped, she threw away. The succubus was making absolutely sure that the peppers she picked would indeed by worthy of going into her chili. "Good. Good. No good. Ugh! This pepper has gone bad!" As Antala had her bucket halfway full, she let out a groan. "I'm not sure it will be perfect even with these peppers. Huh?"

At that very moment, Antala saw a glowing blue light and waddled through the water to investigate when she gave a gasp. The blue light was coming from a ghost pepper that was bigger and thinner than the rest. Antala reached for it and the pepper burned her as she gave a grunt. "That's odd," she says. "I'm a succubus. I shouldn't be able to get burned. Unless." Antala focused on the pepper and realized it was no ordinary ghost pepper. Even without having tasted it, Antala could see it was much hotter than the average ghost pepper and decided that she had found the perfect ingredient for her hot chili.

But was that the only blue pepper she found?
1553321.title: The Pernicious Pepper

15533211.content:
Antala looked around the bushes for more of those blue ghost peppers, but no matter how long and far she searched, there was no other pepper like it. "Nobody else knows about this pepper patch, at least not to my knowledge? Maybe this one is the first bloomer. Well, now that I know this is the only pepper of its kind around, I guess I'm going to have to make this count. Antala took out a bag and placed the blue pepper in it. The pepper's heat was so intense that the bag had already begun to glow. Antala had to put the pepper in the bag in a special box and then put the box in her pocket as the box was already starting to heat up rather violently and letting off smoke.

Antala knew that she had to get home fast, but she saw another zombie alligator going by and figured that she had no time for a fight that was completely unnecessary. So Antala opened her wings and begun to fly. As she did, the light from that blue pepper resembled a will-o-the-wisp. The intense flames caused an apparition of a phoenix appear and scared off all the birds in the area. Nearby there was another monster alone in the swamp.

This monster was a male ghoul resembling a humanoid horse with rotting green skin and jagged teeth and from the looks of it, a receding hairline. The ghoul looked up in the sky and his rotting jaw slipped. "Great balls of fire," he said. "It's happening. I've got to tell the town!" The ghoul had clearly mistaken Antala for something else and jumped into his rowboat before he furiously begun to paddle out to warn of what he suspected of a great disaster. However, Antala didn't care at all about what she might have looked like from a distance. All she was thinking of was peppers.

Antala arrived outside of her shack and walked inside to see smoke coming from her chili. Antala rooted around her fridge for more ingredients. "I'm going to throw a few more ingredients in," said the succubus. "I don't want that blue ghost pepper to overload the chili. Now, a little bit of this, a little bit of that..." Antala tossed in an eye of newt, the tongue of a wolf, whiskers from a hairy crab and even an expired tube of mayonnaise... without even taking it out of the jar. The chili begun to burn brighter right before Antala turned her head. "Well, well, well," said Antala. "It looks good so far. But now, for the final ingredient." Antala reached into her pocket and took out the box containing the bag containing the blue ghost pepper.

The box had already caught fire and as Antala opened it, she saw that the bag she had kept the pepper in had burned into cinders. "Holy cow," said Antala. "Yikes." Antala sniffed the pepper and her eyes begun to water. "Gee willikers." She said. Antala held the pepper and dropped it into the chili. As she did this, the chili erupted into a mushroom cloud shaped like screaming faces that laughed wickedly, causing the succubus to be mildly terrified. "Oh my." She said. Antala gave a gulp and then took out a spoon for the chili.

Right before the spoon melted, Antala put the chili in her mouth and almost immediately, she wished she hadn't. It was so hot that her skin turned blue and her eyes watered before smoke blew out of her nose. Antala screamed and breathed blue fire as her belly bulged until it was....
15533211.title: One of a Kind Pepper

155333.content: This might seem hair-brained but what about lightning and/or electricity?
155333.title: Ain't it Shocking

1553331.content:
Here are some really electric stories (I'm so sorry for that pun).

The Living Battery: In this story, the succubus world is suffering from a complete blackout. The electricity orb that powers all the electronics has run out. It seems hopeless, until Antala comes up with an idea: she can turn herself into a living, walking battery by storing electricity in her belly and hooking up to the power network, powering the electronics until a new electricity orb can be found.

Goddess of Lightning: In this story, Antala amazing track record as a succubus has caught the attention of the Gods council. They tell her that, because of her amazing work, she will be promoted to being a goddess. Antala is given the nenw status as the Goddess of Lightning. She soon finds that it has a bizarre addition: all the lightning in the world, when not in use, is stored in her belly.
1553331.title: Shock it to Me

1553332.content: This is going to be a strange one: how about paint?
1553332.title: Paint a Pretty Picture

15533321.content:
Okay. How's this for a paint option.

The Portrait of Antala Grey - In this one, Antala is a very vain, rich and rather nasty succubus who has recently stiffed an artist on the payment for a painting that she commissioned of herself because she thought it was imperfect. In a rage, the very same painter gets his revenge by casting a curse on Antala, making it so every time he paints, the excess paint fills Antala's stomach.
15533321.title: Let's Paint

155333211.content:
"Now, Sarah. Have you ever seen a more perfect looking image?" asked Antala to her maid. The young succubus was busy eyeing herself in the mirror as she was wearing a new and expensive black dress with pearl earrings and a golden necklace that looked like it was made of skulls. Antala was laughing as she eyed herself. Antala was a very rich and very beautiful succubus. However, she was also very vain and that could get her into trouble at times. She was talking with her maid, Sarah, a werewolf whose body was half white and half black. Sarah looked at her boss nervously and then looked all around.

Antala was in fact, so vain that everywhere around her mansion, there were statues and paintings of her. The fact was that Antala could not get enough of herself. Even the other succubi found her to be obnoxious. "Uh, madam," said Sarah. "I don't mean to interrupt you." Antala just gave a scoff. "Then don't," she said. "You know how I don't like anything getting in the way of my me time." Antala even turned around and wagged her tail before she laughed and made an anime-esque face in the mirror. "Oh," said Antala. "I am one hot succubus." Sarah just shook her head at her mistress's vanity.

"Let me rephrase that, madam," said the wolf woman. "I don't mean to interrupt you, but remember, we have an appointment with Jean-Pierre Orin." Antala's eyes popped out of her head and she turned around, almost knocking Sarah to the floor in the process. "Oh my gosh! That's right. I commissioned Monsieur Orin to paint a portrait of my favorite subject; marvelous moi. You were the one who told me what a great painter, Orin is. Now, I must see it for myself." Antala let out a noblewoman's laugh that made Sarah very uncomfortable. "After all, we can always use more me around here."

It wasn't long before Antala was with Sarah in a limousine and was heading for Jean-Pierre Orin's studio. Antala was preening herself as she smirked. "A perfect shape with virtually 0% fat, flawless crimson skin and sparkling silver hair. Let's face it, Sarah. I'm perfect." "Beauty is only skin deep, madam." Antala just gave a glare to signal to Sarah to shut up and it was there the limousine arrived at the studio. Inside the studio was the owner, Jean-Pierre Orin, a tall, lanky and hunch-backed salmon-skinned gargoyle with no horns, no hair and glowing yellow eyes.

"Mademoiselle Antala," said the gargoyle as he held up a painting that was covered by a tarp. "I present to you what I believe is my finest creation yet." Antala let out a laugh. "It had better be," said the vain and rich succubus. "It's a painting of me isn't it. Now, chop, chop; let's see what it is." Jean-Pierre was proud of himself as he uncovered the tarp and revealed a painting that looked like a stylized version of Antala. Sarah looked at it and was very impressed. "Magnifique." Said the wolf woman, prompting the painter to smile.

Antala however, looked closer and saw a dot on the side of her face in the painting and let out a gasp before becoming enraged. "What is that!?" she yelled. "Is that supposed to be a blemish?" "Well, Mademoiselle," said Jean-Pierre nervously. "I decided to add a beauty mark to highlight your radiant skin." "Beauty mark!?" yelled Antala. "It's a mole. I don't have a mole! Are you trying to make me look grotesque!" Antala in her rage kicked the painting to the ground and startled the painter. "If you think I'm paying for this trash, you have another thing coming. Come along, Sarah!" Antala stomped away and Sarah followed after her in fear.

Of course, what happened did not sit well with Jean-Pierre and he gave a hiss as he took out another canvas and paint. "Trash is it?" asked the gargoyle. "I'll have you know that beauty is only skin deep. It's time somebody taught you a lesson, mademoiselle." Jean-Pierre chanted some strange words as he prepared to cast a curse on Antala.
155333211.title: The Portrait of Antala Grey

15533322.content: This may sound a bit weird, but what about filling her stomach with Earth (rock, dirt, sand, etc)?
15533322.title: Nah.

155333221.content:
Okay, here is the first idea for the Earth path.

Queen of the Mountain - While flying through the air, Antala injures her wing and finds herself on top of a mountain, thousands of feet above the air, that is too treacherous to climb up, let alone down. Antala is wondering how to get off the mountain when she comes up with a rather bizarre method of doing so. Namely, she decides to simply eat the mountain.
155333221.title: Dishing Out Earth

1553332211.content:
Antala was a young succubus who was at that moment, flying over a large valley in the west. She was a marshal in the monster world who was going after a dangerous outlaw. Antala held up a wanted poster in order to get a good idea of what her target was. Antala's mark from the looks of it, was a man wrapped up in bandages like a mummy but with steam-punk goggles and a top hat and from the looks of it, two mechanical prosthetics for arms. Antala nodded her head and then she looked down to see a herd of cattle following men on horseback.

"Hmmm," said Antala as she focused her super eyesight to find the brand. "The brand that those cattle bear is from a ranch that ain't even on the same side of the country as here. Must be rustlers." Antala flew closer and saw that the man leading the rustlers was the very same man from her wanted poster. "Got it," she said. "There you are, Gradius. I finally caught you." That's what Antala thought, but Gradius knew she was coming and turned his head around like an owl, to the surprise of the succubus marshal. Before Antala could react, Gradius lifted up his gun and shot at the succubus, making a direct hit on her wing.

Antala let out a yell as her wing begun to bleed and she shrieked as she tried to fly. However, being 5000ft in the air and injured are hardly a good combination. Antala had to find a safer way to the ground. The cowgirl looked ahead and then she saw what looked like a large mountain. "Bingo." Said the succubus. Antala flew to the top of the mountain just as her wing gave out and she let out a groan. she looked down to see Gradius and his gang getting away and growled. "Dag gum!" As Antala stomped the ground, she took a better look at her surroundings and saw that the entire mountain was covered in the sides with large spikes and at the bottom, the mountain was covered in jagged rocks that looked like they could collapse at any moment.

It was there that the marshal realized where she was and gave a gulp. "Uh-oh," she said. "Porcupine mountain. The most dangerous mountain in the west to climb up, let alone back down again. Cowpokes have killed themselves even trying to get a quarter of the way up this death trap." This was true as underneath the foot of the mountain were the skeletal remains of monsters and humans that were too wedged into the ground to be pulled out. Antala gave a grumble. "Getting down from here is going to take some thought."

Antala stayed on the top of Porcupine Mountain for 30 minutes in an attempt to come up with a way to get off the mountain when her stomach started growling. Antala gave a growl. "Dag gum! I knew I shouldn't have skipped breakfast this morning." Antala then realized something and got an idea. "I wonder." Antala took out a handful of dirt from the top of the mountain and then brought it to her mouth to eat it. Antala gave a grunt and then puts more dirt into her mouth as she begins her plan to eat the mountain. As she does, her stomach begins to bulge and her belt soon feels itself being pushed to the limit.
1553332211.title: Queen of the Mountain

choices: Yes, As Painful as it Sounds
Are You Crazy? She's Just Trying to Break Them
15533322111.content:
Antala ignored the fact that her belly was beginning to bulge with all the dirt and earth that she took from Porcupine Mountain. She just kept stuffing her face as if it was a plate of baked beans. The western marshal took scoop after scoop of dirt, stopping only to gag on the taste. But she worked through the discomfort and continued to chew through the mountain. At one point, several gophers came out of the ground and voiced their discomfort with Antala's insane actions as she took one handful of dirt. One of them even gestured that he was watching Antala before taking out a suitcase and running off with the other gophers. Antala blinked at what happened but then she shrugged her shoulders and got back to the dirt.

After 40 minutes, Antala was feeling dizzy and had managed to swallow most of the dirt. However, instead of eating the last of the dirt, Antala just pushed it away with her boots. "Ugh," groaned the succubus as she felt her large stomach that was groaning in pain. "Bad idea, Antala. Bad idea. I can't believe I ate all that dirt. I wish I could've turned it into mud and washed it away. Dag gum!" Antala paused and looked to see that she had made progress and from the looks of it, half the mountain was gone. However, she also felt guilty at what she had done and shook her head. "I can't believe that I destroyed most of Porcupine Mountain. I can tell you that the mapmakers are not going to like this. But from the looks of it, I'm only 50ft up now, so more power to me." Antala gave a laugh and groaned because her stomach hurt.

Then she looked down and saw something that really made her feel sick. There was nothing left of the mountain but the jagged rocks that made it impossible to climb down in the first place. Antala begun to cry as she saw that she had a lot of her work still cut out for her. "This is just one of those days," groaned the cowgirl. "Huh. Wait, who am I talking to? There ain't nobody around here. Oh. Now I feel even sicker." Antala gave a hiccup but then shrugged her shoulders as she took a small rock and started to break away at a larger piece of rock.

But does Antala really decide to eat rocks?
15533322111.title: Mountain Meal

155333222.content: How about her belly being filled with sound?
155333222.title: Does This "Sound" Good

1553332221.content: The Songstress: In this story, Antala is a popular DJ, often playing to sold out nightclubs in the Succubus World. One day, Symphoni, the Succubus Goddess of Music, shows up at one of Antala's concerts and tells her that she will be her Muse, and grants her the power to control sound, from hypnotic music to sonic screams. But this power causes Antala's belly to somehow fill with sound. And what good timing, since villains have started popping up in the human world.
1553332221.title: The Sound of Expansion

15533322211.content:
Music, one of the greatest joys in life enjoyed by members of all species and ages. Even succubi could enjoy music as not all succubi were evil. One succubi in particular was a DJ in the succubus world. Her name was Antala and she had long silver hair, golden cat-like eyes and bright red skin. She was a DJ who absolutely loved to do what she did. Right now she was jamming it up in the White Hole nightclub. As Antala was playing loud J-pop music that echoed throughout all caves in the succubus world, the patrons of the nightclub were blue-skinned guardian succubi accompanied by the silver-skinned queen who was clapping her hands.

"Alright, everybody!" yelled Antala. "The next big hit is called Shining Roar. A divine tune that will prove even we have souls and hearts. Let's hit it!" Antala played a tune that sounded more like it would be enjoyed by angels, but the succubi enjoyed it all the same and even the queen was hitting it up on the dance floor. She was giggling and clapping her hands as Antala smiled and turned her hat. Of course, the queen was not the only succubus of prominence. There was a golden-skinned succubus with long pink hair worn in pigtails resembling musical notes. She was dressed in a leather jacket with a pair of pants with bubbles all over them and a candy-cane striped shirt. There was only one type of succubi in this world that had golden skin. That tone of skin was reserved only for immortal goddess class succubi. This particular goddess was eyeing Antala.

She smiled and then quietly walked up behind Antala while Antala was swaying from side to side. Antala’s headphones were in and she was too busy jamming to notice the golden succubus right behind her. As Antala was DJing, the golden succubus tapped her back. Antala turned around and then gasped. The golden succubus just smiled. "Nice beats." She said. Antala stopped the music and everyone turned and gasped before they all bowed down. "Y-You, you," said Antala nervously. "You are..." The golden succubus opened her wings as they glowed bright. "I am Symphoni, the succubus goddess in charge of music and I just love your music."

Antala gave a blink. "Wh-Why thank you, Your Highness. I'm... I'm honored." Before Antala could say another word, Symphoni grabbed her mouth. "Hush," she said. "Don't speak. I'd say that I love your music so much that I'm making you an offer. I want you to be my muse." Antala's eyes popped out of her head. To be a muse to a music goddess was a dream come true. The crowd was muttering to themselves and wondering if Antala would accept. "It's really a sweat deal," said Symphoni as she made sound waves resonate in her hand that made the sound of a bell. "You'll have control of all sounds, from the most wonderful orchestra, to the most shrill scream. So what you do say."

Antala gasped with joy and nodded her head. "Lay it on me, Symphoni." She said. Symphoni gave a smile and grabbed Antala's forehead before she cast a spell. For a brief moment, musical notes appeared on Antala's body and they all made different sounds. Antala smiled for the great honor that was placed upon her.

- - -

However, what Antala had no idea was that Symphoni's proposal would also give her an unusual power. This was intention as Symphoni knew there were dangerous villains popping up all around the human world

Note: Both of these villains are OCs of the 12th Doctor. Not mine.

Amalgamation; Real Name: Matthew Crayn, a wrestler who was booted out of the professional circuit after her killed a wrestler. He took an experimental performance enhancing drug, which made him what he is today: a big, dumb muscle for hire.

Stormy Days: Real Name: Kyle Brokk, a meteorologist who was canned for being too boring. He got hit by an orange lightning bolt, which gave him the power to manipulate the weather.

Both these villains were laying in wait waiting to bust out of prison to go on a rampage that would require Antala to deal with.
15533322211.title: The Songstress

155333222111.content:
At that time, Antala had not yet realized the full reason on why she was called by Symphoni and was busy jamming in Symphoni's palace. It was a bright gold colored palace with instruments of all sorts hanging from the wall. Saxophones, banjos, ukeleles, harps, guitars, trumpets, all of which were making noise as Antala was taking full advantage of her new powers. Antala was snapping her fingers to make sounds ring through the temple as Symphoni watched. "Oh yeah!" yelled Antala as she twisted her cap. "This is DJ Antala rapping through the realm of the protector deities. Oh yeah!"

Symphoni giggled and then she heard the sounds of frogs croaking and kittens purring despite the fact there were no such animals in the palace at the moment. Antala clicked her tongue to make a chimney whistle, stomped her feet to make the sounds of a piano keys being played and then she snapped her fingers to make the sound of thunder. "Hey, Symphoni! Check out my new beats! I call it the Sounds all Around." Symphoni smiled and giggled as Antala begun to play. However, Antala was unaware that her fun was going to have a price on her figure. Antala kept on making music until she heard a popping sound.

"Huh?" asked the succubus. "That's crazy. I don't...." Antala then looked down and gasped the bottom on her pants had popped off and her stomach was bulging. "What's happening?" asked Antala in fear. Symphoni shook her head. "Oh, don't worry. It's just a side-effect to remind you to use your powers wisely. Overusing your powers causes sound to build up in your stomach." Antala poked her belly a few times and it made several sounds, such as the sound of a saxophone, the sound of a banshee's scream and even the sound of a birthday song playing. "Okay," said Antala as her red skin turned redder than usual as she blushed. "I guess I did get a little teensy bit carried away."

Symphoni then walked up and snapped her fingers and took out a motorcycle leotard that appeared to be decorated with musical notes. She smiled as she handed it to Antala. Antala held up the unitard and then in a flash the unitard appeared on her body. "What?" asked Antala. "What's this?" "Antala," said Symphoni. "I didn't just recruit you because of your beats. You do realize that the succubi of this world are only supposed to attack bad people, right." Antala nodded her head. "I believe that's the whole deal."

Symphoni then cast a spell revealing dozens of criminals and crooks causing trouble all around the world. "Well," said Symphoni. "There is a higher abundance of evil and crime in the world than there used to be and it's getting too much for us to deal with on our own. Which is why I've decided to recruit somebody to act as a super heroine." Antala was surprised. She looked at her costume and felt as if she had died and gone to Heaven. But then she realized that she had a new gift and she needed to use it as responsibly as possible. After all, those villains weren't going to show any mercy." She gave a determined look as Symphoni approached her again. "So, Antala," said Symphoni. "Have you made your decision."

Antala turned and faced Symphoni. "I've made my decision. All those bad people are causing trouble for innocents and I don't intend to let them get away with it. Count me in." Symphoni nodded her head and then held up a viewing screen. "Wonderful," she said. "This is your first mission." With that, Symphoni showed an image that depicted...
155333222111.title: A Superheroine with Style

15533322221.content: Will her prey be willing or no?
15533322221.title: yes

155333222212.content:
Okay, her prey can either be:

Aiden- 5'2 150 18 year old. Very timid, has bad anxiety, and will not be hard to overpower. Will try to escape, and if (when) you do get him in your tummy, he will be restless, but in reality, he poses no threat and can be dominated very easily

Connor- 6'2 200 20 year old. Grizzled, tough, and is essentially fearless. Catching him will prove difficult, because he is athletic and can get away if you aren't diligent. It doesn't just stop at catching him, keeping him in your stomach could prove troublesome on account of how big he is and how hard he hits (may give indigestion and force vomiting) but will ultimately reward you a lot if you can keep him down.

Who do you choose?
155333222212.title: No

1553332222121.content:
You overpower Aiden very, very easily. You grab him in your strong arms and wrestle him into submission. You easily slide him past your mouth, into your body, and plopping down right inside your stomach. You feel hardly satisfied, in neither the effort (and the thrill of the hunt) nor the meal provided, but you are happy to be full.

His pathetic struggles do little to sway you. You observe Aiden's face being pressed against your stomach, with a fearful face outlining the outside of your hungry stomach in a bulge. His body is big enough to provide a rather large bump, but not big enough to slow or weigh you down noticeably. After a while, however, your blazing insides seem to be ready to process him completely, as is signaled by your stomach groans, beginning to increase in frequency. You notice that Aiden is realizing this too, as he begs you to release him. Indeed, your demonic belly is seeming to afford him only a few more minutes.

What do you do?
1553332222121.title: Aiden

info.brief_description: Good Belly Expansion is hard to come by. This Succubus will change that.
info.description:
Originally made and owned by The Twelfth Doctor (Non Canon).

Under new management. Received from lwut: http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/lwut2929

There don't seem to be many good Belly Expansion stories or Succubus expansion stories on Writing.com. So now, we are going to change that. You are going to help a succubus get a big belly. But first, a few rules.

1. This is belly expansion ONLY. So if you want to do weight gain, breast expansion, or other expansion that aren't belly, this is not the place. So if her belly fills with food, that food stays in the belly only.

2. Although this is an expansion story, there is to be no sexual content. Sexual abuse in particular is not allowed AT ALL.

3. No bodily fluids. That is just gross.

4. No characters under 18. That is just wrong.

5. The main character is the only one who can expand.

6. No male expansion or viewpoints. You can have male characters

7. Nothing involving feet, tickling, farting, diapers, ect.

8. You can have death, but the main character cannot die.

9. No filling her belly with air. That is no fun.

10. You can have her be topless, but panties stay on.

11. Girl/Girl and Girl/Guy is fine, but no Guy/Guy

12. If you're going to have romance, build it up.

13. No instant expansion.

14. No matter what her belly fills with, it has to make her belly heavy.

15. No pregnancy On second though, I'll change this rule. I'll allow pregnancy, but I will not allow birth. If you want pregnancy, make it permanent. This means I will let slight breast and butt expansion IN PREGNANCY CHAPTERS ONLY! If breast and butt expansion show up in any other chapters, I will delete them. Also, make the pregnancy happen by magic or scientific means.

16. The main character cannot shapeshift or change gender. That would throw the flow of the story out the window. (In other words, no TF or TG.)

17. Please, please, please don't make Antala a stereotype. Try to give her some actual depth and character.

18. Please don't focus on only one expansion concept or story. Try to expand your horizon and add to the other stories. You may be surprised to learn what you can write.

19. And finally, please try to have good spelling, grammar, and give the story an actual plot. I would like a minimum of 2 paragraphs (unless it's an option addition)

Other than that, have fun.

The Universe

The World Itself
The Succubus World resembles our world a fair bit. It has a yellow sun, green plants, and a similar atmosphere to Earth. The only difference is there is lava instead of water, and there are no animals.

The Succubi
The Succubus world has only one species: the Succubi. They come in various shapes and sizes, but they all have a few things in common. Succubi are always female: there are no male succubi. They all have unnatural skin colors, from the common red and purple, to the once in a lifetime gold and silver. Despite being the same species, they are not all blood related. Powers depend on the succubus, though they can all change their breast size.

Succubus classes
There are six succubus classes
1. The Soul Takers: the typical succubus of legend. These succubi go out to take the souls of the living. Usually come in red, purple, or white.
2. The Makers: these succubi are responsible for maintaining the landscape, buildings, and machinery. Normally grey.
3. The Summoners: responsible for creating new succubi. This is done either through pregnancy or transformation magic. Summoners who use pregnancy are called Mother Summoners. Summoners who use magic are called Change Summoners. Usually orange.
4. The Guardians: These are the succubi who protect the world. They always are muscular. Usually blue.
5. The Queen: This is the succubus who rules the others. There is only one queen. Always silver.
6. The Goddesses: The highest class. They control the forces of nature and life. Always gold.

Lifestyle
Succubi have a lifestyle much like ours. They live, play, fight, and die like we do. The only difference is they have a longer life span. The shortest a succubus can live is 10000 years. The longest is immortality. Succubi stop aging at 27 years old.
